MESSAGE.JP: 昼休み。
MESSAGE.EN: Lunch break.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lunch break.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドアの方を見ると、こないだの黒い猫が。
MESSAGE.EN: As I glanced at the door, I noticed that black cat I'd seen the other day.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I glanced at the door, I noticed that black cat I'd seen the other day.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また入ってきちゃったのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It came in here again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It came in here again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何か用でもあるんだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Does it have something to do here?
MESSAGE.Translation: Does it have something to do here?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が近付いていくと、その猫はにゃあ、と小さく鳴いた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I walked up to it, the cat gave a subdued meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I walked up to it, the cat gave a subdued meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …いつも笹瀬川さんにくっついてる猫なのに、なんでうちの教室に来るんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It's always following Sasasegawa-san, so why did it come to our classroom?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It's always following Sasasegawa-san, so why did it come to our classroom?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんのとこに連れてったほうがいいのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe I should take it to Sasasegawa-san...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe I should take it to Sasasegawa-san...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手を伸ばすと、あっさりと捕まえられる。
MESSAGE.EN: I reached for the cat and caught it without any difficulty.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reached for the cat and caught it without any difficulty.

MESSAGE.JP: 野良猫にしては人に懐き過ぎてるし、この猫は一体なんなんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: For a stray, it was way too well-behaved around humans. What in the world was up with this cat?
MESSAGE.Translation: For a stray, it was way too well-behaved around humans. What in the world was up with this cat?

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あれ、理樹君どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh, Riki-kun, what's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh, Riki-kun, what's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、小毬さん。この猫…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Komari-san. This cat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Komari-san. This cat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、さーちゃんと一緒の猫さんだね～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, that's the cat that's always with Sa-chan～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, that's the cat that's always with Sa-chan～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。また入ってきちゃってるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes. It got in here again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes. It got in here again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん？　さーちゃんに会いに来たのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm? I guess it's here to see Sa-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm? I guess it's here to see Sa-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「…でも、さーちゃんは多分会ってくれないと思うなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝...But I don't think she'll see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝...But I don't think she'll see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、どうして？　笹瀬川さんに懐いてたでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, why not? It likes her a lot, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, why not? It likes her a lot, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「さーちゃん、猫さんは苦手なんだって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝She said she's not good with cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She said she's not good with cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「なんでだか知らないけど、触ったりできないみたいなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝She hasn't said why, but she can't touch them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝She hasn't said why, but she can't touch them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だから、お世話も私がやってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's why I've been looking after it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's why I've been looking after it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「触れないって、アレルギーとか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can't touch them? Is she allergic or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can't touch them? Is she allergic or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、そうなのかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm, maybe?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm, maybe?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ヴェルカのときのを見てると、動物は好きそうなんだけどねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With how she acted with Belka, I'm sure she likes animals...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With how she acted with Belka, I'm sure she likes animals...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「さーちゃん、犬さんは大好きだからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Isn't that just because Sa-chan likes dogs?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Isn't that just because Sa-chan likes dogs?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁっ、これも黙っててって言われてたんだぁっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howah! She told me not to tell anyone that, either!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howah! She told me not to tell anyone that, either!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、それはもう周知の事実だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, everybody already knows about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, everybody already knows about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、笹瀬川さんのところに行ってみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I suppose I should go see Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I suppose I should go see Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんに案内されて、笹瀬川さんの教室に来る。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san guided me to her classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san guided me to her classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「さーちゃーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sa-chan!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sa-chan!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんがドアから呼びかけると。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san called out to her from the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san called out to her from the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「か、神北さん…あんまり大声でその呼び方はしないでくださいます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ka-Kamikita-san... Would you not call me that in public?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ka-Kamikita-san... Would you not call me that in public?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、そうだったよ…ごめんなさい～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uh, I forgot about that... I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uh, I forgot about that... I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「で、今日は何の御用事かしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So, what can I do for you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So, what can I do for you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、うん。理樹君理樹君っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, that's right. Riki-kun, Riki-kun!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, that's right. Riki-kun, Riki-kun!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この猫なんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝About this cat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝About this cat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh my...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh my...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか、うちの教室に来てたからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was in our classroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was in our classroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …笹瀬川さんは猫を一目見ると、俯いたまま、黙り込んでしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She looked down and fell silent after glancing at the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She looked down and fell silent after glancing at the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…せっかくですけど、わたくしの飼っている猫というわけではありませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I hate to say it, but that's not my pet or anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I hate to say it, but that's not my pet or anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Besides...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Besides...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしは、猫は嫌いですの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I do not like cats...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I do not like cats...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「追い返されちゃったなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A total rejection...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A total rejection...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「しょうがないよー。さーちゃん、猫さんはダメだーっていつも言ってるから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I thought that'd happen. She's always said she doesn't like cats...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I thought that'd happen. She's always said she doesn't like cats...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…でも、何でこの猫、いつも教室まで入ってきてるんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But why does this cat keep coming to school?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But why does this cat keep coming to school?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「この猫さんはさーちゃんが好きなんじゃないかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Maybe it likes Sa-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Maybe it likes Sa-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そっか。そうかもしれないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that might be the case.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that might be the case.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 腕で抱えている猫を見ながら思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about it, looking at the cat I held in my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about it, looking at the cat I held in my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんが猫嫌いって、なんか可哀想だなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's kind of unfortunate that she doesn't like cats...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's kind of unfortunate that she doesn't like cats...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そうだねえ。さーちゃん、きっと本当は猫さんも好きになりたいと思うんだけどなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I agree. I'm sure she actually wants to cuddle them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I agree. I'm sure she actually wants to cuddle them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、いや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Err, that's not what I...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Err, that's not what I...❞

MESSAGE.JP: これだけ笹瀬川さんを慕ってる猫のほうが不憫だな、って思ったんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt sorry for the cat, since it was so obviously attached to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt sorry for the cat, since it was so obviously attached to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, you may be right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, you may be right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんの捉え方も、多分間違ってないと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I didn't think what Komari-san thought was necessarily wrong either.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I didn't think what Komari-san thought was necessarily wrong either.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず、外に連れて行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyhow, let's take it outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyhow, let's take it outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「おっけーですよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が教室を後にしようとすると。
MESSAGE.EN: Just when we were about to leave the room...
MESSAGE.Translation: Just when we were about to leave the room...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …黒猫は僕の腕からするりと抜け出して、教室のドアへ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...the black cat shook free of my arms and sprinted for the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...the black cat shook free of my arms and sprinted for the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だ、ダメだよー。戻らないと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝N-No, you can't stay here. You have to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝N-No, you can't stay here. You have to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「フーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fwaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fwaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁっ、ご、ごめんなさいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howah! I-I'm sorry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howah! I-I'm sorry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さん、弱いなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Komari-san, you're so weak...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Komari-san, you're so weak...

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら黒猫は笹瀬川さんにだいぶ未練があるらしく、そこを動こうとしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat seemed to determined to see Sasasegawa-san that it wouldn't budge an inch.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat seemed to determined to see Sasasegawa-san that it wouldn't budge an inch.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…参ったなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...What should we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...What should we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふむう。困ったねえ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmmm. It's quite the dilemma...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmmm. It's quite the dilemma...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「このままじゃ先生に怒られちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝If one of the teachers finds it, we'll be scolded.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝If one of the teachers finds it, we'll be scolded.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりで考え込む。
MESSAGE.EN: We both tried to come up with some solution.
MESSAGE.Translation: We both tried to come up with some solution.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…あなたたち、まだやってますの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...You two are still with the cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...You two are still with the cat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、さーちゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh, Sa-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh, Sa-chan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よくわからないけど、笹瀬川さんに用があるみたいなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know why, but it looks like the cat's pretty attached to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know why, but it looks like the cat's pretty attached to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…仕方ありませんわね。外まで連れて行きますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I guess I am left with no choice. I shall take it outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I guess I am left with no choice. I shall take it outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いいの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「さっきのあなたの言い方だと、まるでわたくしが悪いみたいに聞こえますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What you just said makes it sound as if I am wholly responsible for this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What you just said makes it sound as if I am wholly responsible for this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それに、飲み物を買うついでですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Besides, I need to buy something to drink outside anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Besides, I need to buy something to drink outside anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「さーちゃん、ありがと～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sa-chan, thanks a lot～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sa-chan, thanks a lot～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だ、だから、ただのついでですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I told you, I need to buy something to drink anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I told you, I need to buy something to drink anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …笹瀬川さん、なんだかんだで面倒見はいいんだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Despite all she says, she's a very considerate person.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Despite all she says, she's a very considerate person.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは先頭に立って、廊下を歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: We walked down the hallway with Sasasegawa-san in the lead.
MESSAGE.Translation: We walked down the hallway with Sasasegawa-san in the lead.

MESSAGE.JP: その足元には、黒い猫。
MESSAGE.EN: That black cat followed along at her feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: That black cat followed along at her feet.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんとなく、その姿が弟分みたいに見えた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It somehow gave off the air of a baby brother walking next to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It somehow gave off the air of a baby brother walking next to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何でこの猫、笹瀬川さんに懐いてるんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you have any idea why that cat likes you so much, Sasasegawa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you have any idea why that cat likes you so much, Sasasegawa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「知りませんわよ、そんなこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How should I know...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How should I know...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「この猫さん、最初すごく弱ってたんだ。それをさーちゃんが見つけて、私と一緒にお世話してたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝This cat was very weak when Sa-chan first found it. We've been treating it together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝This cat was very weak when Sa-chan first found it. We've been treating it together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「神北さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Kamikita-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Kamikita-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなたはいつもいつも、いらないことを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You always say such unnecessary things...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You always say such unnecessary things...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふ、ふええ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fu-Fuee?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fu-Fuee?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「お仕置きですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You deserve to be punished!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You deserve to be punished!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ほわぁっ、ご、ごめんなさぁーいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Howah! I-I'm so sorry!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Howah! I-I'm so sorry!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 追いかけっこを始める。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san started chasing Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san started chasing Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、このふたりはいつもこんなノリなんだろうなぁ、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...For some reason, I got the feeling that these two were always like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...For some reason, I got the feeling that these two were always like this.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんって言うと、鈴と対峙してる殺伐とした状況しか見てこなかったから、やっぱり意外だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to admit that I was very surprised, given how I'd only ever seen the way she acted when confronting Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to admit that I was very surprised, given how I'd only ever seen the way she acted when confronting Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 裏庭を抜けて、体育館側へ。
MESSAGE.EN: We passed through the backyard and headed toward the gym.
MESSAGE.Translation: We passed through the backyard and headed toward the gym.

MESSAGE.JP: …校舎裏まで来る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We finally arrived at the back of the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We finally arrived at the back of the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ここでもういいでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You can take care of yourself from here, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You can take care of yourself from here, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫はうなあ、と一声鳴くと、今は使われていない、古い錆び付いた焼却炉の片隅に座る。
MESSAGE.EN: Crying ❛unyah,❜ the cat sat down right beside the old, rusted incinerator, which was no longer in use.
MESSAGE.Translation: Crying ❛unyah,❜ the cat sat down right beside the old, rusted incinerator, which was no longer in use.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここがお気に入りの場所なのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is this its favorite place?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is this its favorite place?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、いつもここにいるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it's always here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it's always here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃあ、わたくしは戻りますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall be heading back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, I shall be heading back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、さーちゃんありがとうー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sure, thanks a bunch, Sa-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sure, thanks a bunch, Sa-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…わ、わたくしは何もしてませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I-I did nothing at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I-I did nothing at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言いながら、笹瀬川さんは足早に去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: With those words, she departed briskly.
MESSAGE.Translation: With those words, she departed briskly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、僕らも戻ろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, we should head back, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, we should head back, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sure～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sure～.❞

MESSAGE.EN: ...As soon as I said that,
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As soon as I said that,

MESSAGE.JP: 猫が僕の足元まで歩いてきて、なう～、と一声鳴く。
MESSAGE.EN: the cat walked up to my feet and let out a meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: the cat walked up to my feet and let out a meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、今度は僕？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, now it's me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, now it's me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「何か言いたいことでもあるのかなぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Maybe it has something it wants to say to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Maybe it has something it wants to say to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「っていっても、猫の言葉なんてわかんないしなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I can speak cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I can speak cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、そうだねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm, right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm, right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ、りんちゃんならわかるかもしれないねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, Rin-chan could probably translate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, Rin-chan could probably translate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、さすがにそれは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I highly doubt it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I highly doubt it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …結局中庭まで来て、鈴に話を訊いてみることに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We made our way to the courtyard and asked Rin for help.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We made our way to the courtyard and asked Rin for help.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーん、あの黒猫か…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm, that black cat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm, that black cat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、りんちゃんなら何とかなるかと思ったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes. I thought you might be the only one who could help us out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes. I thought you might be the only one who could help us out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こまりちゃんの頼みなら断れないが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's impossible to refuse when you're asking me for help, Komari-chan, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's impossible to refuse when you're asking me for help, Komari-chan, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うぅーむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「難しそう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You think it's too difficult?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You think it's too difficult?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ダメそうかなぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's no good?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's no good?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いや、他ならぬこまりちゃんの頼みだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But when it's Komari-chan asking for help...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But when it's Komari-chan asking for help...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、無理そうならしょうがないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you can't do it, you can't do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you can't do it, you can't do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そのとおりだ。無理ならしょうがないんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's right. If it can't be done, it can't be done, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's right. If it can't be done, it can't be done, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だが、やはりこまりちゃんの頼みを断るわけには…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But how can I possibly turn down this request from Komari-chan...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But how can I possibly turn down this request from Komari-chan...❞

MESSAGE.JP: だいぶ苦悩しているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: This situation seemed to be causing her a great deal of anguish.
MESSAGE.Translation: This situation seemed to be causing her a great deal of anguish.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、無理ならしょうがないでしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, there's no point in worrying if you can't do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, there's no point in worrying if you can't do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、仕方ないよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝He's right, don't worry about it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝He's right, don't worry about it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「すまん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうもあいつはあたしの事を嫌ってるみたいだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It feels like that one hates me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It feels like that one hates me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、そうなのか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hmm, you think so～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hmm, you think so～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どーも黒猫とは相性悪いことが多いな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I seem to have trouble making friends with black cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I seem to have trouble making friends with black cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いいやつももちろんいるんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There are nice ones, too, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There are nice ones, too, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、そういえば前に教室でも凶暴なやつが居たねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, that reminds me of the violent one that came to our classroom before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, that reminds me of the violent one that came to our classroom before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつといい、こっちのといい、なんかあたしの周りの黒猫は、心を開かないやつが多いんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's another one. A lot of the black cats around here won't open up to me for some reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's another one. A lot of the black cats around here won't open up to me for some reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だから、あんまり期待しないで欲しいが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's why I don't want you guys to expect too much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's why I don't want you guys to expect too much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「とりあえず、やってみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I'll give it a shot anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I'll give it a shot anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「フーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fwaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fwaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuka――!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「交渉は決裂した…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Negotiations have broken down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Negotiations have broken down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…せめてなにかしよう、っていう鈴なりの努力はすごくよく伝わったよ。ありがとう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... I could tell that you did everything you could for us. Thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... I could tell that you did everything you could for us. Thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しかしあいつ…なんだかおかしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I must say... there's something weird about that one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I must say... there's something weird about that one.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「詳しくは見てないからわからんが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝As I couldn't get a close look, I can't say anything for sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝As I couldn't get a close look, I can't say anything for sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだか元気がなさそうに見えた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But that one doesn't seem very spirited.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But that one doesn't seem very spirited.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 改めて、猫のほうを見てみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at the cat yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at the cat yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: 動き疲れたのか、片隅で丸くなって寝に入っているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The little trip must have tired it out; it was curled up into a ball sleeping.
MESSAGE.Translation: The little trip must have tired it out; it was curled up into a ball sleeping.

MESSAGE.JP: 元気がなさそう、といわれればそう見えなくもないけど。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't seem unwell, but I had no way to tell if it was supposed to be more energetic.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't seem unwell, but I had no way to tell if it was supposed to be more energetic.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「気のせいかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It might've just been my imagination.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It might've just been my imagination.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そうだねぇ、元気そうに見えたけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I think so, too. It did look well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I think so, too. It did look well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうやったって、猫の言葉なんてわからないからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Regardless of what we did, we had no way to figure out what the cat was trying to tell us...
MESSAGE.Translation: Regardless of what we did, we had no way to figure out what the cat was trying to tell us...

MESSAGE.JP: 何を考えてるかわからなくても、何かは考えてるんだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: We only knew that there was something it wanted to tell us.
MESSAGE.Translation: We only knew that there was something it wanted to tell us.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局僕らは何もすることが出来ず、その場を後にしたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Unable to come up with a solution, we left for the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unable to come up with a solution, we left for the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室へ戻る途中。
MESSAGE.EN: On our way back...
MESSAGE.Translation: On our way back...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あ、あいつは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝T-That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝T-That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…あら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Oh my.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Oh my.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「笹瀬川佐々美!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Sasami Sasasegawa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Sasami Sasasegawa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴もすっかり噛まずに言える様になったみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin no longer had a problem pronouncing her name correctly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin no longer had a problem pronouncing her name correctly.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんなところで奇遇ね、棗鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Fancy coming across you in a place like this, Rin Natsume.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Fancy coming across you in a place like this, Rin Natsume.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「お前こそ、こんなところに何か用があったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You too. What brings you here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You too. What brings you here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「別に用なんてありませんわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Nothing in particular...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Nothing in particular...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「猫さんならあっちで寝てるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝The cat's sleeping over there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝The cat's sleeping over there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、猫に用事なのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What? You came here for the cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What? You came here for the cat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、様子を見に来たの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, you must be here to check on it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, you must be here to check on it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「違いますわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Most certainly not!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Most certainly not!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ａ@「佐々美様っ、また棗鈴ですかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member A@❝Sasami-sama! Is it Rin Natsume again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member A@❝Sasami-sama! Is it Rin Natsume again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ｂ@「おのれっ、性懲りもなく佐々美様にたてつくとはっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member B@❝Damn you! When will you learn the folly of challenging Sasami-sama...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member B@❝Damn you! When will you learn the folly of challenging Sasami-sama...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ｃ@「棗鈴など、今の佐々美様の敵ではありませんわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member C@❝How can someone like Rin Natsume be an opponent worthy of Sasami-sama!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member C@❝How can someone like Rin Natsume be an opponent worthy of Sasami-sama!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの三人組まで現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: The usual trio also showed up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The usual trio also showed up.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ho...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ho...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「おーっほっほっほほ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oo-hohhohhohho!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oo-hohhohhohho!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「最近なんだか色々とアレで、すっかり忘れていましたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝With all the things that happened recently, I had forgotten...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝With all the things that happened recently, I had forgotten...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗鈴…わたくしたちもあれから、さらに精進を重ねてまいりましたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume... The four of us have been training ourselves ever since that day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume... The four of us have been training ourselves ever since that day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いまや棗鈴、あなたなど足元にも及ばないほどにね!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You can no longer hold a candle to us, Rin Natsume!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You can no longer hold a candle to us, Rin Natsume!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、またバトル…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, another battle...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, another battle...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ａ@「望むところですっ、佐々美様っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member A@❝This is what we've been waiting for, Sasami-sama!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member A@❝This is what we've been waiting for, Sasami-sama!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ｂ@「私たちにお任せください、佐々美様っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member B@❝Let us take care of her, Sasami-sama!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member B@❝Let us take care of her, Sasami-sama!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ｃ@「さあ棗鈴、かかってらっしゃいなっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member C@❝Bring it on, Rin Natsume!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member C@❝Bring it on, Rin Natsume!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はちらり、と小毬さんのほうを見る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin cast a sideways look at Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin cast a sideways look at Komari-san.

MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは状況が全くわかっていないようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san didn't seem to understand what was going on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san didn't seem to understand what was going on.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…悪いがかかっていかない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Sorry, but I will not bring it on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Sorry, but I will not bring it on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ａ@「なっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member A@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member A@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「お前らとケンカしてもしょーがない。むえきなあらそいだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There's no point in fighting you guys. It's a futile quarrel.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There's no point in fighting you guys. It's a futile quarrel.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それより、なかよくしたほうが多分いいことだと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Instead, I think we should become friends with each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Instead, I think we should become friends with each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「な、なかよく…!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝B-Become friends...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝B-Become friends...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が思いっきり大人の意見を言っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin expressed a very adult opinion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin expressed a very adult opinion.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「名前、なんて言うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What is your name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What is your name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ａ@「わ、わたし…ですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member A@❝M-My... name?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member A@❝M-My... name?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uh-huh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uh-huh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ａ@「は、はぁ…川越令ともうします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member A@❝W-Well... my name is Rei Kawagoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member A@❝W-Well... my name is Rei Kawagoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「かわごえさんか。そっちは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kawagoe-san, got it. What about yours?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kawagoe-san, got it. What about yours?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ｂ@「わ、渡辺咲子です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member B@❝Sa-Sakiko Watanabe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member B@❝Sa-Sakiko Watanabe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ソフト部Ｃ@「中村由香里ですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Club Member C@❝Yukari Nakamura...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Club Member C@❝Yukari Nakamura...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、かわごえさんにわたなべさん、なかむらさんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Okay. Kawagoe-san, Watanabe-san, and Nakamura-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Okay. Kawagoe-san, Watanabe-san, and Nakamura-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もーおまえたちとはケンカしないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I won't be fighting with you girls any more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I won't be fighting with you girls any more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `中村@「えぇっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nakamura@❝Ehh...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nakamura@❝Ehh...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `渡辺@「さ、佐々美様…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Watanabe@❝Sa-Sasami-sama...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Watanabe@❝Sa-Sasami-sama...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `川越@「ど、どうしたらいいでしょう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kawagoe@❝W-What are we supposed to do now...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kawagoe@❝W-What are we supposed to do now...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「う、うぅ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝U-Uuu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝U-Uuu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 向こうは鈴のいつもと全く違う態度に戸惑っているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin's sudden change in attitude threw the four of them for a loop.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin's sudden change in attitude threw the four of them for a loop.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…な、なんですの？　新手の嫌がらせですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...W-What is this? Some new form of harassment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...W-What is this? Some new form of harassment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そんなつもりは全くない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I have no such intentions.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I have no such intentions.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「く…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ku...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ku...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `渡辺@「どうしましょう、佐々美様…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Watanabe@❝What do we do, Sasami-sama...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Watanabe@❝What do we do, Sasami-sama...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `中村@「なんだか人間的にすごく敗北した気分です…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nakamura@❝I feel like we've utterly lost to her as human beings...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nakamura@❝I feel like we've utterly lost to her as human beings...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `川越@「わたしたちのアイデンティティが崩壊していくようですっ…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kawagoe@❝It feels like our identities are collapsing...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kawagoe@❝It feels like our identities are collapsing...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「き…今日のところは引き上げですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-We will be taking our leave for today!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-We will be taking our leave for today!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ん、なんだ、帰っちゃうのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm, what, you guys are leaving?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm, what, you guys are leaving?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗鈴…覚えてらっしゃいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume... Remember this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume... Remember this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「かわごえさんにわたなべさん、なかむらさんだな。覚えたぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kawagoe-san, Watanabe-san, and Nakamura-san. I'll remember them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kawagoe-san, Watanabe-san, and Nakamura-san. I'll remember them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふ、ふんっ…行きますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝H-Hmph! ...Let us depart this place!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝H-Hmph! ...Let us depart this place!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三人@「お待ちください、佐々美様～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Trio@❝Wait for us, Sasami-sama～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Trio@❝Wait for us, Sasami-sama～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …４人は去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The four girls left.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The four girls left.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えらいね、鈴。悪ノリしないで、話し合いで解決しようとしたんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're great, Rin. You tried to settle things through dialogue instead of fighting, didn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're great, Rin. You tried to settle things through dialogue instead of fighting, didn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん…だが上手くいかなかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yeah... But it didn't seem to work.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yeah... But it didn't seem to work.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そんなことないよ。お名前を教えあったんだから、もうおともだちだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Actually, it did. You learned their names, so you're all friends now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Actually, it did. You learned their names, so you're all friends now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そ、そうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝W-We are?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝W-We are?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、きっとだいじょうぶだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep. I'm sure of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep. I'm sure of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なら、よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then it's all good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then it's all good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: この間のヴェルカの一件から、鈴の笹瀬川さんに対する意識も変わってきているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Since the day Rin saw Belka and Sasasegawa-san together, her view of her has been changing little by little.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since the day Rin saw Belka and Sasasegawa-san together, her view of her has been changing little by little.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、とてもいいことだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I believe that to be a very good thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I believe that to be a very good thing.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、時間は過ぎて。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, at a much later date...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, at a much later date...

MESSAGE.JP: 『僕ら』の世界が終わった後。
MESSAGE.EN: After ❛our❜ world came to an end,
MESSAGE.Translation: After ❛our❜ world came to an end,

MESSAGE.JP: もうひとつの物語が、始まろうとしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: another story was about to begin.
MESSAGE.Translation: another story was about to begin.

MESSAGE.JP: ある夜。
MESSAGE.EN: One night.
MESSAGE.Translation: One night.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は、夢を見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: What was it about?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was it about?

MESSAGE.JP: 孤独な夢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a lonely dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a lonely dream.

MESSAGE.JP: 取り残されてないている、誰かの夢だ。
MESSAGE.EN: A dream of someone left outside... Someone other than me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A dream of someone left outside... Someone other than me.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、僕の記憶かとも思った。
MESSAGE.EN: At first I had thought it was another memory.
MESSAGE.Translation: At first I had thought it was another memory.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、違う。
MESSAGE.EN: But it wasn't.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it wasn't.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢の主人公である、『誰か』には、手が差し伸べられることはなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Nobody offered that ❛someone,❜ the protagonist of that dream, a helping hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nobody offered that ❛someone,❜ the protagonist of that dream, a helping hand.

MESSAGE.JP: その身体は、どこまでも冷たい。
MESSAGE.EN: Their body was horribly cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: Their body was horribly cold.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I knew.
MESSAGE.Translation: I knew.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ない』ことよりも、『なくす』ことの方が、何倍も冷たいということを。
MESSAGE.EN: That ❛losing something❜ was so much colder than ❛never having❜ it.
MESSAGE.Translation: That ❛losing something❜ was so much colder than ❛never having❜ it.

MESSAGE.JP: 目が覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: I woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: I woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: 今見ていた夢を思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to remember the dream I just had.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to remember the dream I just had.

MESSAGE.JP: それは、悪夢だろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was it... a nightmare?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was it... a nightmare?

MESSAGE.JP: …もう僕は、そんな夢は見ないはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I shouldn't be having dreams like that any more.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I shouldn't be having dreams like that any more.

MESSAGE.JP: 寝ぼけた頭を、少しだけ働かせる。
MESSAGE.EN: I put my still-muddled brain to work.
MESSAGE.Translation: I put my still-muddled brain to work.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢の中で、僕の記憶じゃないことは判っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: While I was having that dream, I could tell it wasn't related to any of my memories.
MESSAGE.Translation: While I was having that dream, I could tell it wasn't related to any of my memories.

MESSAGE.JP: …じゃあ、誰の記憶なのだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: ...Then whose memories were they?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Then whose memories were they?

MESSAGE.JP: この夏、僕は…僕らは、とても不思議な体験をしてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I... No, we went through a very mysterious experience this past summer.
MESSAGE.Translation: I... No, we went through a very mysterious experience this past summer.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、僕は『そういう不思議なこと』があることを知っている。
MESSAGE.EN: That event taught me that 'mysteries' really do exist in this world.
MESSAGE.Translation: That event taught me that 'mysteries' really do exist in this world.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかすると、これも…その『不思議なこと』なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's possible that the dream I just had... was also one of those ❛mysteries.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It's possible that the dream I just had... was also one of those ❛mysteries.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…考えすぎかなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Or am I just overthinking it?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Or am I just overthinking it?)

MESSAGE.JP: ふわあ、とあくびを一つして、目を擦る。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a yawn and rubbed my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a yawn and rubbed my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 時計を見ると、まだ８時ちょっとだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The clock showed it to be a few minutes past eight.
MESSAGE.Translation: The clock showed it to be a few minutes past eight.

MESSAGE.JP: …傍らには、西園さんから借りた本が何冊か。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The books I borrowed from Nishizono-san lay next to my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The books I borrowed from Nishizono-san lay next to my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: 読んでいるうちに寝てしまったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems I fell asleep while reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems I fell asleep while reading.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふっ!!　ふんっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hoo!! Hooh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hoo!! Hooh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …サッシのほうでは、相変らず真人が筋トレを続けていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Masato was working out by the window like any other day.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Masato was working out by the window like any other day.

MESSAGE.JP: あの掛け声の中で寝ていても、筋肉の夢を見ることはないらしい。よかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Having to sleep beneath his heavy breathing, I'm just glad that I didn't dream of muscles.
MESSAGE.Translation: Having to sleep beneath his heavy breathing, I'm just glad that I didn't dream of muscles.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、起きたか理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, you're awake, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, you're awake, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…ふああぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... huaaaah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... huaaaah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ずいぶんと気持ちよさそうな寝顔だったが、美しい筋肉の夢でも見てたのかい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You looked so happy in your sleep. Let me guess, were you dreaming of beautiful muscles?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You looked so happy in your sleep. Let me guess, were you dreaming of beautiful muscles?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな夢を見ないでよかった、って思ってたところだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, and actually, I was just thinking of how relieved I was that it wasn't a dream like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, and actually, I was just thinking of how relieved I was that it wasn't a dream like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうか…実はさっきちょっと、耳元で『筋肉…筋肉…』とささやいてみたんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see... Actually, I was whispering ❛muscle... muscle...❜ in your ear for a while...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see... Actually, I was whispering ❛muscle... muscle...❜ in your ear for a while...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ…しないでよ、そんなこと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eehh... Why would you do that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eehh... Why would you do that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だってよ、お前にはいい夢見て欲しいじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's, you know, because I wanted you to have a good dream.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's, you know, because I wanted you to have a good dream.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気持ちはうれしいけど、子守り筋肉は止めてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The sentiment is appreciated, but I don't want you singing me a muscle lullaby...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The sentiment is appreciated, but I don't want you singing me a muscle lullaby...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まあ、こんな時間に長々寝てちゃ、朝まできっちり寝られなくなっちまうぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, you shouldn't be sleeping this early, otherwise you'll have trouble sleeping until morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, you shouldn't be sleeping this early, otherwise you'll have trouble sleeping until morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…じゃ、ちょっと散歩がてらジュース買いに行ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right... Well, I guess I'll take a walk and buy some juice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right... Well, I guess I'll take a walk and buy some juice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえさ、ジュース買いに行くの好きだよな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You really like going out to get juice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You really like going out to get juice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そう？　なんか習慣みたいなもんなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You think so? I guess it's become a habit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You think so? I guess it's become a habit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうだ、買いに行くくらいなら、よぅく冷えたこいつで一杯やるといいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah, right, I can share my cold drink with you so you can save your time and money.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah, right, I can share my cold drink with you so you can save your time and money.❞

MESSAGE.JP: どん、と２リットルのペットボトルを出す。
MESSAGE.EN: He put a 2 liter plastic bottle on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: He put a 2 liter plastic bottle on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇ…なにそれ、また作ったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... What's that? Another original drink?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... What's that? Another original drink?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「人呼んでオレ製マッスル・エクササイザーセカンドだ。名前がカッコいいとクー公にも評判だぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's called 'Muscle Exerciser II Made by Me.' Little Kuu said the name sounded pretty cool.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's called 'Muscle Exerciser II Made by Me.' Little Kuu said the name sounded pretty cool.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その評判は、中身については全く言及していない。
MESSAGE.EN: Her review had nothing to do with the drink itself.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her review had nothing to do with the drink itself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、遠慮しておくよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I think I'll pass...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I think I'll pass...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうか？　出来たてでまだ飲んじゃいねえが、なんかカツみたいな香りがして、案外いけそうだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You sure? I haven't had any myself since I just made it, but it has to be great because it smells like pork cutlet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You sure? I haven't had any myself since I just made it, but it has to be great because it smells like pork cutlet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 茶色いのは、多分ソースのせいなんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: That brown color must come from the Worcestershire sauce...
MESSAGE.Translation: That brown color must come from the Worcestershire sauce...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（どんな味がするんだろう…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I wonder what it tastes like...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I wonder what it tastes like...)

MESSAGE.JP: 気になるけど、なんだか飲んだら本当にマッスルになってしまいそうでいやだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: My curiosity was piqued, but I was afraid I might really turn into muscle if I drank it...
MESSAGE.Translation: My curiosity was piqued, but I was afraid I might really turn into muscle if I drank it...

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、真人の謎ドリンクは飲まないで外に出た。
MESSAGE.EN: I ended up leaving without trying Masato's mystery drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ended up leaving without trying Masato's mystery drink.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「涼しくなったなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's quite chilly already...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's quite chilly already...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 秋の空気は、長袖シャツ一枚じゃ寒いくらいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The autumn air was so frigid that I wished I'd worn a long sleeve shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: The autumn air was so frigid that I wished I'd worn a long sleeve shirt.

MESSAGE.JP: もう、とっくに夏は過ぎてしまったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Summer was already long gone.
MESSAGE.Translation: Summer was already long gone.

MESSAGE.JP: 缶ジュースを一本買って、寮に戻る道を歩く。
MESSAGE.EN: I was walking back to the dorm after having bought a can of juice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was walking back to the dorm after having bought a can of juice.

MESSAGE.JP: 見上げれば雲がうっすらと掛かる月、耳を澄ませば虫の音。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking up at the sky, I found the moon covered by a thin layer of clouds. When I focused on the sounds around me, I could hear a concert of bell crickets.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking up at the sky, I found the moon covered by a thin layer of clouds. When I focused on the sounds around me, I could hear a concert of bell crickets.

MESSAGE.JP: 風流だとか、そんな高尚なことはよくわからないけれど。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't really understand why they were considered elegant.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't really understand why they were considered elegant.

MESSAGE.JP: …今が、穏やかですごくいい夜だってことは、僕でも解る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Still, I could certainly tell that it was a calm and pleasant night.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Still, I could certainly tell that it was a calm and pleasant night.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…小毬さんにメールでも出そうかな）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...Guess I'll text Komari-san.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...Guess I'll text Komari-san.)

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は月が綺麗でいい夜だよ、って。
MESSAGE.EN: I should let her know that it's a nice night with a beautiful moon in the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should let her know that it's a nice night with a beautiful moon in the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 色々なことがあった。
MESSAGE.EN: A lot of stuff had happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: A lot of stuff had happened.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、今こうして『いい夜』を感じていられるということは、何よりかけがえのないものなんだ、と思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, I believed that having such a 'beautiful night' at this very moment was more precious than anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, I believed that having such a 'beautiful night' at this very moment was more precious than anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 大切にしなきゃいけない。今って言う時間を、何よりも。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to treasure it. The present only comes once.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to treasure it. The present only comes once.

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋へ向かう途中。
MESSAGE.EN: On my way back to my room...
MESSAGE.Translation: On my way back to my room...

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「にゃー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Nyah!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Nyah!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 足元に猫が駆け寄ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A black cat ran up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: A black cat ran up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、ちょっと、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, hey, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, hey, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫は僕の足元をぐるぐる回りながら、鳴き続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: It kept crying, running circles around my feet.
MESSAGE.Translation: It kept crying, running circles around my feet.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か見覚えがあると思ったら、何度か僕の教室まで来ていた猫だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It took me a moment to realize that it was the black cat that would occasionally visit my classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: It took me a moment to realize that it was the black cat that would occasionally visit my classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-What is it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-What is it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: なにか、言いたいことがあるみたいだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like it wanted to tell me something...
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like it wanted to tell me something...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっぱりわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no clue what, though.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no clue what, though.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「うな～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Una～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Una～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、なんかガッカリしてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, it looks depressed...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, it looks depressed...

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、寮の中に入ってたら色々とまずい。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, I'm going to get in trouble if the cat hangs around in the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, I'm going to get in trouble if the cat hangs around in the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴にしても、寮内じゃ僕の部屋以外ではおおっぴらに猫を連れてはいないくらいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin even attempts to keep her cats out of sight inside the dorm, with the exception of my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin even attempts to keep her cats out of sight inside the dorm, with the exception of my room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しょうがないなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It doesn't leave me much choice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It doesn't leave me much choice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫を捕まえに掛かると。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to catch the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to catch the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ふぎゃーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fugyaahh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fugyaahh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ものすごい声で拒絶された…。
MESSAGE.EN: It rejected me with a furious hiss...
MESSAGE.Translation: It rejected me with a furious hiss...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと…別に僕は何もしないよ。ほら、大丈夫だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-hey... I'm not gonna hurt you. There's nothing to worry about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-hey... I'm not gonna hurt you. There's nothing to worry about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ふーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fshaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fshaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 警戒されまくりだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It had its guard up completely...
MESSAGE.Translation: It had its guard up completely...

MESSAGE.JP: いつもだったら簡単に捕まってくれるのになぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: Unlike before, there's no way it would let me catch it now.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unlike before, there's no way it would let me catch it now.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もう…じゃあ、追い出されても知らないからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Geez... All right then, don't blame me if you get kicked out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Geez... All right then, don't blame me if you get kicked out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 諦めて、部屋に戻ることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave up and started walking to my room again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave up and started walking to my room again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕の後ろに猫がついてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The cat was following me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The cat was following me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（変な猫だなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What a weird cat...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What a weird cat...)

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろをみると、猫はまだついてきていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I looked back, it was still following me.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I looked back, it was still following me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこまで来るんだろう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How far are you going to follow me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How far are you going to follow me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返り、足を止めると、猫もそこで止まる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I stopped and turned around, the cat stopped, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I stopped and turned around, the cat stopped, too.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか、全然わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was completely puzzled.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was completely puzzled.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「よう、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hey, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hey, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろから声を掛けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone called out to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone called out to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、謙吾…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Kengo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Kengo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「人の部屋の前で何をしているんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you doing in front of my room?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you doing in front of my room?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…猫が、さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... Ask this cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... Ask this cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ねこ？　…こんなところまで入ってきているのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Cat? ...How did that get in here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Cat? ...How did that get in here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の前にいる黒猫を横から覗き込む。
MESSAGE.EN: He peered at the cat by my side.
MESSAGE.Translation: He peered at the cat by my side.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「にゃ…ふにゃーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Nya... Funyaahh!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Nya... Funyaahh!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、なんかすごい声…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wow, it sounds really lively now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wow, it sounds really lively now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「な、なんだ、変な猫だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝W-What's with that weird cat...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝W-What's with that weird cat...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「にゃ、にゃー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Nya, nyahh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Nya, nyahh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾の言葉にショックを受けたようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo's comment seemed to have shocked the cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo's comment seemed to have shocked the cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「一体何なんだ、この猫は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What on earth is that cat doing here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What on earth is that cat doing here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さあ…よくわからないけど、僕にくっついて来るんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows... I don't know why, but it's been following me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows... I don't know why, but it's been following me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なるほどな。懐かれてしまったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see. So the cat likes you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see. So the cat likes you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやー、そういうわけじゃないと思うんだけど…触ろうとすると怒るし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I kinda doubt that... It gets mad when I try to touch it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I kinda doubt that... It gets mad when I try to touch it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「じゃ、どうするんだ。世話をしてやるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you planning to do, then? Look after it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you planning to do, then? Look after it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、そういうわけじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? No, I wasn't...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? No, I wasn't...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どちらにしろ、寮の中じゃ飼えないからな。寮長に見付かる前になんとかした方がいいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Either way, you're not allowed to keep pets in the dorm. You'd better do something about it before the dorm head finds out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Either way, you're not allowed to keep pets in the dorm. You'd better do something about it before the dorm head finds out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「鈴のように、半野良で世話をしてやるのがいいんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Maybe you should mimic how Rin looks after her cats?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Maybe you should mimic how Rin looks after her cats?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、そうなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I suppose...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I suppose...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか、この猫さ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But this cat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But this cat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ん？　なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hm, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hm, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気になるんだよね…なにか、僕に言いたいことがあるような…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It feels different... It seems like it wants to tell me something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It feels different... It seems like it wants to tell me something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふむ…確かに挙動はおかしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Well... Now that you mention it, the cat is acting rather peculiar.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Well... Now that you mention it, the cat is acting rather peculiar.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「しかし残念だが、俺には猫のことはよくわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝But I'm afraid I don't know much about cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝But I'm afraid I don't know much about cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それこそ、鈴にでも訊いた方がいいだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm sure Rin will be of more help to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm sure Rin will be of more help to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうしてみようかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess I'll ask her...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess I'll ask her...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ、それがいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah, that'd be for the best.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah, that'd be for the best.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ところで今日はこれから何かやらないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝By the way, why don't we do something fun tonight?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝By the way, why don't we do something fun tonight?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうだね。じゃあ何かやろうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sure, why not? Let's do something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sure, why not? Let's do something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何をやるかは、みんな揃ってから決めようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I think we should get everyone together before deciding what to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I think we should get everyone together before deciding what to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「みんなか…だが、今日は恭介がいないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Everyone... But Kyousuke isn't here today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Everyone... But Kyousuke isn't here today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そうなの？　言われてみたら、朝から恭介の姿を見ないね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh? Come to think of it, I haven't seen him since this morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh? Come to think of it, I haven't seen him since this morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「また、就活に向かっているようだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He's on his way to another job interview.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He's on his way to another job interview.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、恭介が帰ってきてからかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then why don't we wait until he's back?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then why don't we wait until he's back?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なにい…そ、そうか、そうだな。リトルバスターズはみんなで一つだからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What? ...Y-Yeah, you're right. It's not the Little Busters if we're not all together...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What? ...Y-Yeah, you're right. It's not the Little Busters if we're not all together...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しょぼーん、と肩を落とす謙吾。
MESSAGE.EN: His shoulders drooped in disappointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: His shoulders drooped in disappointment.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「しかたない、俺は部屋に戻るとしよう。風呂上がりだしな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝All right then, I'll just go back to my room. I just took a shower anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝All right then, I'll just go back to my room. I just took a shower anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。引き止めてごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sure. Sorry to keep you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sure. Sorry to keep you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「何、気にするな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: He went back into his room.
MESSAGE.Translation: He went back into his room.

MESSAGE.JP: あのしょんぼりっぷりを見てると、何かイベントを開いてあげた方がよかったかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: His hunched back emanated enough depression to make me regret not putting together some sort of an event for him.
MESSAGE.Translation: His hunched back emanated enough depression to make me regret not putting together some sort of an event for him.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか謙吾、風呂上がりでもわざわざ胴着着るんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He even wears his kendo uniform to the showers...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He even wears his kendo uniform to the showers...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 相変らずよくわからないこだわりようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I could never understand that policy of his.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could never understand that policy of his.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに胴着の裏地には、リトルバスターズのロゴが刺繍してあり、最近のお気に入りらしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: Incidentally, the kendo uniform he was wearing now bore a Little Busters logo stitched on its back as proof of his recent fancy...
MESSAGE.Translation: Incidentally, the kendo uniform he was wearing now bore a Little Busters logo stitched on its back as proof of his recent fancy...

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「にゃ、にゃぁ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Nya, nyah～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Nya, nyah～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫は謙吾の部屋を前に、弱々しく鳴いている。
MESSAGE.EN: The black cat just kept crying weakly in front of his door.
MESSAGE.Translation: The black cat just kept crying weakly in front of his door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここには入れないってさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't go in there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't go in there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「にゃうぅ～ん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Nyaauu～n...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Nyaauu～n...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …とても悲しそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It seemed very sad somehow...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It seemed very sad somehow...

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「ん、なんか猫の声しねえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Hm, didn't that sound like a cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Hm, didn't that sound like a cat?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Shoot...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Shoot...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 誰か来る…。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone was coming...
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone was coming...

MESSAGE.JP: 見つかるとまずいし、一度僕の部屋に行こう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd be in trouble if they found me with the cat, so I decided to take it to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd be in trouble if they found me with the cat, so I decided to take it to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫はよほどショックが大きかったのか、ぼんやりしてる間に簡単に捕まえられた。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat was so shocked that I was able to catch it without an issue this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat was so shocked that I was able to catch it without an issue this time.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（しかし、何なんだろう、この猫…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(What is the deal with this cat, anyway?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(What is the deal with this cat, anyway?)

MESSAGE.JP: 猫を連れて、部屋まで戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: I made it to my room with the cat in my arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I made it to my room with the cat in my arms.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん、何だその猫」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hm, why are you holding a cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hm, why are you holding a cat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ちょっとね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, it's a long story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, it's a long story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 座布団の上に下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: I set the cat on a cushion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I set the cat on a cushion.

MESSAGE.JP: …まだショックを受けてるのか、おとなしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It must've still been shocked, as it didn't move.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It must've still been shocked, as it didn't move.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　ここで飼うのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Are we gonna keep it here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Are we gonna keep it here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そういうわけにもいかないとは思うんだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't know if I'd go that far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't know if I'd go that far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふーん、また鈴みてえなこと始めんだな、お前は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmm? So you're gonna start following in Rin's footsteps.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmm? So you're gonna start following in Rin's footsteps.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめん、邪魔かな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, will it bother you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, will it bother you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んなことねえよ。オレだって猫は好きだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Not at all. I like cats, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Not at all. I like cats, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひょい、と猫を抱える。
MESSAGE.EN: He lifted the cat up.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lifted the cat up.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、こいつメスか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Look, this one's female.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Look, this one's female.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「フギャァーーッ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝FUGYAAAAAAAH!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝FUGYAAAAAAAH!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばすっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Foomp*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Foomp*.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 開いたままの真人の目に、猫の手が。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat's paw was on Masato's open eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat's paw was on Masato's open eye.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「のっぎゃぁぁああぁぁーーーっ!!　に、肉球がぁあぁぁぁあぁーーーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nogyaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!! Pad on my eeeeeeeeyeeeeeeee!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nogyaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!! Pad on my eeeeeeeeyeeeeeeee!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ、だ、大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah, y-you all right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah, y-you all right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「フーッ!!　フシャーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fukaaa!! Fshaaaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fukaaa!! Fshaaaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: め、めちゃくちゃ怒ってる…。
MESSAGE.EN: The cat was totally pissed off...
MESSAGE.Translation: The cat was totally pissed off...

MESSAGE.JP: と思ったら、とぼとぼと部屋の隅に歩いていって、丸くなった。
MESSAGE.EN: But in the next breath, it walked to the corner of the room and curled up.
MESSAGE.Translation: But in the next breath, it walked to the corner of the room and curled up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、真人…眼は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝M-Masato... Is your eye okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝M-Masato... Is your eye okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ、ああ…大丈夫だ、心配ねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Y-Yeah... it's fine. Don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Y-Yeah... it's fine. Don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふう、オレの強靭な筋肉を持ってしなければ、普通に潰されているところだったぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew. It would have been flattened it it weren't for my solid muscles...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew. It would have been flattened it it weren't for my solid muscles...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、真人は眼が筋肉なの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, Masato, are your eyes muscles?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, Masato, are your eyes muscles?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「え？　メガ筋肉？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Eh? Ice Muscles?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Eh? Ice Muscles?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 違う。
MESSAGE.EN: No.
MESSAGE.Translation: No.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おいおいよせよ、メガ筋肉って…いくら筋肉ことオレといえど、メガまではいかねえよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hey, stop kidding. Ice Muscles? ...Muscle may be my alias, but even my muscles aren't cool and solid enough to be called Ice Muscles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hey, stop kidding. Ice Muscles? ...Muscle may be my alias, but even my muscles aren't cool and solid enough to be called Ice Muscles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、メガでもギガでもないけどさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm not talking about how cool or solid they are...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm not talking about how cool or solid they are...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しかし、えらく凶暴な猫だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But that cat is quite the fiend...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But that cat is quite the fiend...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきまでは、そこまで攻撃的じゃなかったはずなんだけどなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It wasn't that aggressive until now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It wasn't that aggressive until now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、真人、眼は大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, Masato, are you sure your eye is okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, Masato, are you sure your eye is okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ？　心配すんなって、大丈夫だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah? No worries, it's fine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah? No worries, it's fine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、ちょっと見せて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, let me see it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, let me see it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、いいって、大丈夫だからよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nah, you don't have to. It's all right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nah, you don't have to. It's all right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ダメだよ。傷でも付いてたら、すぐ眼科いかないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just let me do it. If it's been scratched or something, you'll have to go to an eye doctor right away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just let me do it. If it's been scratched or something, you'll have to go to an eye doctor right away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「げっ…なおさら大丈夫だっての!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Geh... Then I'm definitely fine!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Geh... Then I'm definitely fine!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「医者行きたくないだけでしょ。ほら、見せてってば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know you just don't wanna see the doctor. Let me see your eye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know you just don't wanna see the doctor. Let me see your eye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹こそ…お、おまえ、やべーぞ、顔に穴がふたつも空いてるじゃねーかっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki... Y-You should worry about yourself, instead. You've got two holes in your face!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki... Y-You should worry about yourself, instead. You've got two holes in your face!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どこに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「鼻に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝In your nose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝In your nose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「正常だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's normal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's normal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: と、こんこん、とノックの音。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone knocked on the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone knocked on the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほら、誰か来たじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Look, someone's at the door.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Look, someone's at the door.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごまかされないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't think that'll fool me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't think that'll fool me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、扉に呼びかける。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered the visitor.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered the visitor.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だれ？　恭介？　とりあえず入っちゃっていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who is it? Kyousuke? Come on in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who is it? Kyousuke? Come on in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ったく、今日の理樹はなんでこんなに強引なんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit, why are you being so aggressive today, Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit, why are you being so aggressive today, Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、こういうときいつも黙ってて結局行かないじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because otherwise you won't be quiet and let me take you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because otherwise you won't be quiet and let me take you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、西園さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, it's Nishizono-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, it's Nishizono-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば恭介は就活でいないんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I should've guessed it wasn't Kyousuke since he was out hunting for a job.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should've guessed it wasn't Kyousuke since he was out hunting for a job.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「す、すごい場面に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝W-What a scene...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝W-What a scene...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「だまってて…い、いかない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝B-Be quiet... and let him take you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝B-Be quiet... and let him take you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「これはさすがに犯罪的な…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This really could be called criminal...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This really could be called criminal...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんかよくわからないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I don't really know what you're talking about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I don't really know what you're talking about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「は、はぁ…し、しかも…わたしを招き入れるとは…見てもかまわないということでしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝H-Haah... And on top of that... you just let me in... Does that mean you don't mind being watched...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝H-Haah... And on top of that... you just let me in... Does that mean you don't mind being watched...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: いつにもまして西園さんの思考が暴走しているようだった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Nishizono-san seemed to be lost in her own private world.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nishizono-san seemed to be lost in her own private world.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あの、どうしましたか？　何の話でしょうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um, what's happening? What are you talking about...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um, what's happening? What are you talking about...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんに一緒についてきたと思われるクドが、ひょっこりと顔を出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud, who was probably with Nishizono-san, poked her head out.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud, who was probably with Nishizono-san, poked her head out.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「衝撃の現場を目撃してしまいました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I just witnessed something truly shocking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I just witnessed something truly shocking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、あのさ…よくわからないけど、真人がいつも怪我しても黙ってて、医者行きたがらないって話だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-You know... We were just talking about how Masato never tells anyone when he's injured, just so he doesn't have to go see a doctor...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-You know... We were just talking about how Masato never tells anyone when he's injured, just so he doesn't have to go see a doctor...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ha!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ha!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「とりあえず…攻守逆の場合、意外とアリということが解りました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Anyway... I just learned that the reversal actually works.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Anyway... I just learned that the reversal actually works.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やはり、奥が深い」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This really is profound.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This really is profound.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「よくわかりませんが、とてもでぃーぷなお話なのですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I don't really understand, but I can see that it's something very dii-pu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I don't really understand, but I can see that it's something very dii-pu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…いずれ能美さんにも、わかる日が来るかもしれません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You may come to understand it one day, too, Noumi-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You may come to understand it one day, too, Noumi-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「最近ではテニス辺りが入門編としてよろしいかと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I can recommend Tennis as a good introduction for beginners...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I can recommend Tennis as a good introduction for beginners...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー、てにすは経験がありますよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu! Tennis, I've played that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu! Tennis, I've played that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、もういいのか理樹っち」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, you done yet, Rikicchi?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, you done yet, Rikicchi?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんだか、これ以上は西園さんを喜ばせるだけな気がしてきた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was starting to think that arguing with him would just please Nishizono-san more...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was starting to think that arguing with him would just please Nishizono-san more...

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふう。危うく病院に連れていかれるところだった…西園のおかげで助かったぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Phew. I almost got taken to the hospital... Thanks, Nishizono, you saved my ass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Phew. I almost got taken to the hospital... Thanks, Nishizono, you saved my ass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなにいやなのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Just how badly did he fear hospitals?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just how badly did he fear hospitals?

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっどいぶにんぐー、井ノ原さんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo ibuningu, Inohara-san!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo ibuningu, Inohara-san!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、クー公もどうした、こんな時間に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yo, Little Kuu, what are you two doing here at this hour?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yo, Little Kuu, what are you two doing here at this hour?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それはですねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝We are here to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝We are here to...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「攻め直枝さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san on the offensive...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san on the offensive...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「やはり、アリです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I like the sound of it after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I like the sound of it after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや不穏当な発言はもうそれくらいでいいから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Would you please refrain from making any more inappropriate remarks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Would you please refrain from making any more inappropriate remarks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「それは…失礼しました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Oh... I apologize.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Oh... I apologize.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、用事の方を先に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Well then, as for our business here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Well then, as for our business here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この間お貸しした本なのですが、あの中の一冊に、能美さんがとても興味を引かれるという本があるそうです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san is very interested in one of the books I lent you the other day.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Noumi-san is very interested in one of the books I lent you the other day.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえすいえす、そうなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Iesu, iesu, that I am.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Iesu, iesu, that I am.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「海と雲に覆われた惑星…そこで消息を絶った調査隊」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A planet covered entirely in oceans and clouds... and all contact is lost with the research team there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A planet covered entirely in oceans and clouds... and all contact is lost with the research team there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そこへ訪れた学者さんが不可解な謎に満ちた現象に遭する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝A scientist visits the planet and encounters an inexplicably mysterious phenomenon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝A scientist visits the planet and encounters an inexplicably mysterious phenomenon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「守備範囲外ですが、映画版と比べてみても面白いですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I haven't seen it myself, but I think it'll be fun to compare the book to its movie adaptation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I haven't seen it myself, but I think it'll be fun to compare the book to its movie adaptation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー、せんすおぶわんだーでいんたらすてぃんぐな予感がしますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu, that gives me a sensu obu wanda- and an intaresutingu feel!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu, that gives me a sensu obu wanda- and an intaresutingu feel!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「実はこれは、元々来ヶ谷さんに勧めて頂いたものなのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝To tell the truth, Kurugaya-san is the one who originally recommended the book to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝To tell the truth, Kurugaya-san is the one who originally recommended the book to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ＳＦ的なものが来ヶ谷さんの好みのようですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝She seems to be interested in sci-fi works.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝She seems to be interested in sci-fi works.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、来ヶ谷さんのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Kurugaya-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Kurugaya-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、わかる気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It did click, somehow.
MESSAGE.Translation: It did click, somehow.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「先ほどお伺いしたのですが、どうやら来ヶ谷さんは読んだ本はすぐに捨ててしまうようで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝We went over to her room before we came here, but she seems to throw books away after she's read them once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝We went over to her room before we came here, but she seems to throw books away after she's read them once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…もったいないことです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...What a waste.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...What a waste.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来ヶ谷さんの場合、一度読んだらもうそれで十分って感じなんだろうなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure just reading them once is enough for her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure just reading them once is enough for her.❞
