MESSAGE.JP: 内容全部覚えてそうだし。
MESSAGE.EN: I wouldn't be surprised if she's memorized every book she's ever read.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wouldn't be surprised if she's memorized every book she's ever read.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そういうわけですので、能美さんに是非お渡しいただければと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That said, I'd like you to give Noumi-san my copy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That said, I'd like you to give Noumi-san my copy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ちょっと難しそうですが、たまにはそういうのも読んでみたいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It appears to be a somewhat difficult read, but I want to try out something like that for a change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It appears to be a somewhat difficult read, but I want to try out something like that for a change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、じゃあ、それは先に返しておくよ。今読んでるのもだいぶかかりそうだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, okay, that's fine with me. I'm pretty sure it'll take me a while to finish the one I'm currently reading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, okay, that's fine with me. I'm pretty sure it'll take me a while to finish the one I'm currently reading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「やー、さんくゆーです、リキー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yay, sanku yuu, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yay, sanku yuu, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、携帯かなんかで連絡してくれれば良かったのに。そしたらこっちから女子寮まで持っていったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you could've just texted me. I would've brought the book to you in the girls' dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you could've just texted me. I would've brought the book to you in the girls' dorm.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「文明の利器に頼らず、自分の足で歩くことも大切です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's important to walk around on your own two legs from time to time rather than use a product of modern civilization.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's important to walk around on your own two legs from time to time rather than use a product of modern civilization.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 要するに、相変らず操作が苦手だということだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, she was still having a hard time handling her cellphone.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, she was still having a hard time handling her cellphone.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、いいけど…じゃ、持ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, whatever... I'll get you the book right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, whatever... I'll get you the book right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 枕元に置いてある本の中から、その本を探す。
MESSAGE.EN: I searched through the books around my pillow.
MESSAGE.Translation: I searched through the books around my pillow.

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あっ、これは噂のまっする・えくささいざーせこんどですねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah! This is the massuru ekusasaizaa sekondo that everyone's talking about, is it not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah! This is the massuru ekusasaizaa sekondo that everyone's talking about, is it not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、セカンドだけどな。クー公もこれ飲んでメガ筋肉を目指すか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah. It's ❛second,❜ though. Wanna drink it and get Mega Muscles with me, Little Kuu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah. It's ❛second,❜ though. Wanna drink it and get Mega Muscles with me, Little Kuu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ、めがとはすごい筋肉なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu! Mega Muscles? That sounds super cool!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu! Mega Muscles? That sounds super cool!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おうっ、ふたり合わせてギガ筋肉だ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sure does! Combined, we'll have Giga Muscles!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sure does! Combined, we'll have Giga Muscles!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それは凄まじい破壊力なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝That'll have extreme destructive power!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝That'll have extreme destructive power!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ふたり合わせても２メガ筋肉にしかなりません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Even combined, you'd only have two Mega Muscles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Even combined, you'd only have two Mega Muscles.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「西園も合わせてオメガ筋肉だなっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝And with Nishizono, we'll have Omega Muscles!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝And with Nishizono, we'll have Omega Muscles!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふーっ!!　もはやこずみっくですーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu!! It's already kozumikku!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu!! It's already kozumikku!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「テラな上に３メガ筋肉です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's tera, not omega, and it would only be three Mega Muscles.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's tera, not omega, and it would only be three Mega Muscles.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「響きが三馬鹿に似ていますね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Rather than three mega, it'd be the three st...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Rather than three mega, it'd be the three st...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、何の話してるのさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, what are you talking about...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, what are you talking about...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「では早速いただいてみましょうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝All right then, let's give the beverage a try!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝All right then, let's give the beverage a try!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よっしゃ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's the spirit!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's the spirit!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「飲むとマッスルに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The drink that turns you into muscle...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The drink that turns you into muscle...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、飲むの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you want to drink it...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you want to drink it...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いえ、その前に少しシミュレーションを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝No, before that, I must run a little simulation...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝No, before that, I must run a little simulation...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「では、頂きます。ごくっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Bottoms up. *Gulp*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Bottoms up. *Gulp*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「うっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Hah...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Hah...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ふしゅるー…ンッンー、キミィ、イイ身体してるねェー。マッスルマッスルー!!　…です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝*Fwooo*... Hmm, you there, you've got a nice body. Muscle, muscle!! ...And there we have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝*Fwooo*... Hmm, you there, you've got a nice body. Muscle, muscle!! ...And there we have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「結構いいかも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I think I liked it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I think I liked it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、あ、そう…」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Haahh...!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuruu... Hmmm, you there, you've got a nice body. Muscle, muscle!! Nanodesu!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Is that a cat?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, yes. It's a long story.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's a difficult one...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It seems darker... and unlike hers...?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Never mind. I think it's just my imagination.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...There is no way... something like that would ever happen again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …自分に言って聞かせるように、西園さんは呟いた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She murmured, as if to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She murmured, as if to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んぐっ、これは、なかなか…
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmmg, this is fairly...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmmg, this is fairly...

MESSAGE.JP: ぶばふぅーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: bubahuu!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: bubahuu!!❞

MESSAGE.EN: While Masato spewed the mysterious drink out of his mouth, Kud had been frozen in place with a complicated expression ever since her first gulp.
MESSAGE.Translation: While Masato spewed the mysterious drink out of his mouth, Kud had been frozen in place with a complicated expression ever since her first gulp.

MESSAGE.Translation: She then silently left for the bathroom...

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Thank goodness I didn't drink it...)

MESSAGE.EN: Masato and I decided to go to bed shortly after the girls went back to their dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato and I decided to go to bed shortly after the girls went back to their dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んじゃ、お休み、理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Night, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Night, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、お休み」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, night.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝*Ngooo*...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: He fell asleep immediately, as usual.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Speaking of which, I forgot about the cat...)

MESSAGE.JP: 窓開けとけば、そこから出ていくかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: The windows are open, so it'll probably get out on its own, I thought...
MESSAGE.Translation: The windows are open, so it'll probably get out on its own, I thought...

MESSAGE.JP: …また、夢。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Another dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Another dream.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。

MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered why.

MESSAGE.JP: 後悔している。

MESSAGE.Translation: Someone was regretting something.

MESSAGE.JP: …と、思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Or so it seemed to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Or so it seemed to me.

MESSAGE.JP: もし僕だったら、きっとそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: If it were me, I'm sure I would regret.
MESSAGE.Translation: If it were me, I'm sure I would regret.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、嘆くんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And then I would lament.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then I would lament.

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてこうなってしまったんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How did things turn out like this?
MESSAGE.Translation: How did things turn out like this?

MESSAGE.JP: 誰がこうしてしまったんだろう。

MESSAGE.Translation: Who was it that made this happen?

MESSAGE.JP: 『どう』も『こう』も、『誰』も『何』もわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛How,❜ ❛why,❜ ❛who,❜ or ❛what❜, nothing was certain.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛How,❜ ❛why,❜ ❛who,❜ or ❛what❜, nothing was certain.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、僕は思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I was simply thinking that...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was simply thinking that...

MESSAGE.JP: きっと『誰か』はとても後悔している。
MESSAGE.EN: this ❛somebody❜ must be wallowing in deep regret.
MESSAGE.Translation: this ❛somebody❜ must be wallowing in deep regret.

MESSAGE.JP: それはその時から、今に至るまで、ずっと。
MESSAGE.EN: From way back then until now. Yes, the entire time.
MESSAGE.Translation: From way back then until now. Yes, the entire time.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっと…。
MESSAGE.EN: The entire time...
MESSAGE.Translation: The entire time...

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「起きなさいって言ってるでしょう!!
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I said wake up!!
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I said wake up!!

MESSAGE.Translation: My consciousness began to return upon the realization that somebody was shaking me.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm... Who...?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: I opened my eyes.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... Sasasegawa-san... Don't often see you here...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ehhhhh!? W-What are you doing here, Sasasegawa-san!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Shhhhh!! Y-You're too loud!!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If someone finds the two of us here, they might get the wrong idea!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇぇ…だ、だって、ええ？」

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeehhh... B-But, eeeeeehh?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are not fully awake yet, are you...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aha, I get it now... This is a dream.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It. Is. REAL!! Will you wake up already!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: She pinched my cheeks with both hands.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That hurts!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぐりぐりされる。

MESSAGE.Translation: She pulled them up and down, left and right.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いたいってっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I said that hurts!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I said that hurts!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んだよ、理樹…誰かいんのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the heck, Riki? ...Is someone with you down there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the heck, Riki? ...Is someone with you down there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 上のベッドから真人の声。

MESSAGE.Translation: Masato asked from the upper bunk.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼむっ。

MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*!

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san vanished in the blink of an eye.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fu-Funyaaahhh!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeeeehhhhh!?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Sa-Sasasegawa-san...

MESSAGE.EN: ...turned into a cat!?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...turned into a cat!?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だからなんだってんだ…筋肉でも漏らしちまったのかい？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the hell's going on...? Did your muscles wet the bed or something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the hell's going on...? Did your muscles wet the bed or something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや筋肉は漏らしようがないけど、だって、えぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, your muscles can't wet the bed... Well, it's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, your muscles can't wet the bed... Well, it's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さ、笹瀬川さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sa-Sasasegawa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sa-Sasasegawa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …僕の言葉に、黒猫は頷いたような気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I thought the black cat gave a nod to my question.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I thought the black cat gave a nod to my question.

MESSAGE.JP: だめだ、少し冷静になろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my god, I need to calm down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my god, I need to calm down.

MESSAGE.JP: 簡単に言うとだ。
MESSAGE.EN: To put it simply,
MESSAGE.Translation: To put it simply,

MESSAGE.JP: 夜、寝てるところに笹瀬川さんが来て。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san had come over here while I slept,
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san had come over here while I slept,

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の目の前で猫になった。
MESSAGE.EN: and she'd turned into a cat right in front of my eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: and she'd turned into a cat right in front of my eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: …待て待て待て。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Wait, wait, wait.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Wait, wait, wait.

MESSAGE.JP: そんなこと、起きるわけないじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: How was that even possible?
MESSAGE.Translation: How was that even possible?

MESSAGE.JP: いや、でも目の前で起こったわけだし。
MESSAGE.EN: But it had definitely happened just now.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it had definitely happened just now.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁぁあぁ冷静になれるわけないじゃないかぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwaaahhh, how can I calm down!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwaaahhh, how can I calm down!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんなんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's wrong with you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's wrong with you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人はベッドから下りると、部屋の電気をつけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato got down out of bed and switched the lights on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato got down out of bed and switched the lights on.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ふにゃーっ、うにゃにゃーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fumeow!! Meowww!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fumeow!! Meowww!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだ、猫かよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, it's just that cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, it's just that cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう、猫だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Yes, it was that cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yes, it was that cat.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、さっき僕が見たことは、夢じゃないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: However, it seemed like what I had just witnessed wasn't a dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, it seemed like what I had just witnessed wasn't a dream.

MESSAGE.JP: だって、さっきつままれた両ほっぺたが痛いから。
MESSAGE.EN: After all, both of my cheeks still hurt from her pinching.
MESSAGE.Translation: After all, both of my cheeks still hurt from her pinching.

MESSAGE.JP: ほっぺたをつまんでぐりぐりするってことは、猫にはできるはずがない。
MESSAGE.EN: How could a cat pinch someone's cheeks and twist them around?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could a cat pinch someone's cheeks and twist them around?

MESSAGE.JP: あの一瞬で笹瀬川さんがどこかに隠れた、なんてこともありえない。
MESSAGE.EN: And there certainly hadn't been enough time for her to hide somewhere.
MESSAGE.Translation: And there certainly hadn't been enough time for her to hide somewhere.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんだよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's Sasasegawa-san!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's Sasasegawa-san!!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この猫が笹瀬川さんだったんだ!!　真人、見てなかったの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This cat was Sasasegawa-san until just a moment ago!! Masato, didn't you see her!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This cat was Sasasegawa-san until just a moment ago!! Masato, didn't you see her!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ？　なんも見ちゃいねえが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uh? I saw nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uh? I saw nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なるほどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁっ、真人が僕より冷静だ…余計混乱するよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh my gosh, you're actually taking it more calmly than I am... Which is confusing me even more!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh my gosh, you're actually taking it more calmly than I am... Which is confusing me even more!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、理樹がんなアホなことを言い出すなんて、今ここが夢だってこったろうよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No, I mean, this must be a dream. You'd never say anything this retarded in real life...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No, I mean, this must be a dream. You'd never say anything this retarded in real life...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「夢ならバカバカしいぜ。二度寝しよーっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If this is a dream, it'd just be ridiculous to continue listening to you. I'm going back to sleep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If this is a dream, it'd just be ridiculous to continue listening to you. I'm going back to sleep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ぐがー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝*Gugaaahhhh*.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝*Gugaaahhhh*.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇーっ、本当なのにっ。起きてよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeehhh, this IS real! Wake up!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeehhh, this IS real! Wake up!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「うにゃーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meowww!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meowww!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫とふたり（？）で真人に突っ込む。
MESSAGE.EN: Both the cat (?) and I tried to convince him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Both the cat (?) and I tried to convince him.

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃ、現場を目の当たりにしないと、信じられないのも無理はないだろうけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: But his reaction was understandable; who would've believed me without first witnessing her transformation themselves...?
MESSAGE.Translation: But his reaction was understandable; who would've believed me without first witnessing her transformation themselves...?

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「うにゃう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 黒猫（笹瀬川さん？）もその辺りは諦めているようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: The black cat (Sasasegawa-san?) seems to have also given up on convincing him.
MESSAGE.Translation: The black cat (Sasasegawa-san?) seems to have also given up on convincing him.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んだよ、何か？　おまえは夢じゃねえってのかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh, what? You saying this isn't a dream...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh, what? You saying this isn't a dream...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うんっ、本当だって、信じてよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, this is real! You've got to believe me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, this is real! You've got to believe me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹…オレがおまえのことを疑うことは絶対にねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki... I never doubt you, ever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki... I never doubt you, ever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレはバカだからな。親友のお前の言葉を疑おうなんて思ったこともねえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm an idiot, so I've never even thought of doubting a word you say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm an idiot, so I've never even thought of doubting a word you say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そうだぜ、オレは一体何を迷っていたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's right, why the heck have I been hesitating?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's right, why the heck have I been hesitating?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よし、じゃあおまえの言葉を信じるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright, I believe you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, I believe you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、ありがとう!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, thanks!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, thanks!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おうっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh yeah!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh yeah!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 状況を話し終える。
MESSAGE.EN: I explained what had just happened.
MESSAGE.Translation: I explained what had just happened.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、この猫が笹瀬川さんなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In other words, this cat is Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In other words, this cat is Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ほーう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hoh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hoh?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝U...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝U...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どうしたの、真人？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-What's the matter, Masato?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-What's the matter, Masato?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、ちょっと頭痛がな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nothing, just a little headache...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nothing, just a little headache...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「で、それは元に戻るのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝So, will she turn back into a human being?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝So, will she turn back into a human being?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、さっき一瞬だけ戻ったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, she was in human form just a few moments ago.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, she was in human form just a few moments ago.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ううにゃ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meow～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meow～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん、何とか元に戻れない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, do you think you can do it again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, do you think you can do it again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「にゃにゃっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meow! Meow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meow! Meow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ううぅ、なんか言葉が通じればいいんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uuu, if only I could understand what you're saying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uuu, if only I could understand what you're saying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「なう～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Nauu～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Nauu～...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Riki...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Riki...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレは本当にバカだからよう…どうしたらいいかわかんねえんだよう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Since I'm a real idiot... I have no clue what to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Since I'm a real idiot... I have no clue what to do...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝U...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝U...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「う、うおおぉぉおぉーっ!!　知恵熱がああぁああぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝U-Uoooohhhhh!! All this thinking burned a hole in my brain!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝U-Uoooohhhhh!! All this thinking burned a hole in my brain!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が本気で苦しんでいる…。（とはいえ知恵熱でここまで盛大にフィーバーするのはさすがと感心してしまう）
MESSAGE.EN: He was in serious anguish... (not to mention, I was impressed to see someone actually fry a hole in their brain just from thinking.)
MESSAGE.Translation: He was in serious anguish... (not to mention, I was impressed to see someone actually fry a hole in their brain just from thinking.)

MESSAGE.JP: きっと、僕への信頼と、目の前にある事態の異常さの間で揺れ動いているんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: He must have been torn between trusting me and the bizarre situation he was facing...
MESSAGE.Translation: He must have been torn between trusting me and the bizarre situation he was facing...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめんよ、真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ、ああ…大丈夫だぜ。なんかそんなのもあるんじゃないかなーって気になってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝A-Ah... I'm fine. I'm starting to think something like that might actually be possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝A-Ah... I'm fine. I'm starting to think something like that might actually be possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: このフィーバーは真人の本能が生み出した、一種の防衛機構のようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That burning sensation must have been some sort of natural defense mechanism.
MESSAGE.Translation: That burning sensation must have been some sort of natural defense mechanism.

MESSAGE.JP: かなり色々なものが心配だけど、現状を把握してくれるのは助かる。
MESSAGE.EN: While it caused me to worry about him, I was grateful that he eventually understood the situation.
MESSAGE.Translation: While it caused me to worry about him, I was grateful that he eventually understood the situation.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「しかしよう、実際に見てみねえことには、なんともしようがないぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝But you know, I really have no idea what to do since I didn't see it happen myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝But you know, I really have no idea what to do since I didn't see it happen myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「恭介とか来ヶ谷の姉御なら、なんか考えてくれそうだけどよ…オレにはさっぱりだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm sure Kyousuke or Kurugaya could come up with some good idea... but I can't think of anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm sure Kyousuke or Kurugaya could come up with some good idea... but I can't think of anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「うにゃ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meow～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meow～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: どうやら、自在に変身したりできるわけではないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't seem like she could transform at will.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't seem like she could transform at will.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「とにかく、オレにやれることはやってみるが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Anyhow, I'll do what I can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Anyhow, I'll do what I can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ふーむ、どれどれ？　よいしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmm, let's see now. Here you go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmm, let's see now. Here you go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 抱えあげる。
MESSAGE.EN: He lifted her up.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lifted her up.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ふぎゃーッ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fumeowwwww!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fumeowwwww!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: がぶぅっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Bites*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bites*!!

MESSAGE.JP: 一声上げると、真人の手に噛み付いた!!
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a ferocious cry and bit his hand!!
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a ferocious cry and bit his hand!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「のっぎゃああぁぁああぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Nogyaaaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Nogyaaaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ふしゃーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Hiissss―――!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Hiissss―――!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人がひるんだところに、顔面を爪で引っ掻く!!
MESSAGE.EN: She attacked his face when he let go of her!!
MESSAGE.Translation: She attacked his face when he let go of her!!

MESSAGE.JP: ばりばり
MESSAGE.EN: *Scratch*scratch*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Scratch*scratch*

MESSAGE.JP: ばりばりばりぃっ
MESSAGE.EN: *scratch*scratch*
MESSAGE.Translation: *scratch*scratch*

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ぎぃやああ
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝GyAA
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝GyAA

MESSAGE.JP: ぁぁああぁぁ
MESSAGE.EN: aaAAAaa
MESSAGE.Translation: aaAAAaa

MESSAGE.EN: aaa!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: aaa!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: そして宙で身を翻し…。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she did a somersault mid-air...
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she did a somersault mid-air...

MESSAGE.JP: ばっ
MESSAGE.EN: *Wha
MESSAGE.Translation: *Wha

MESSAGE.JP: きぃぃぃいいいーっ!!!
MESSAGE.EN: aaaaam*!!!
MESSAGE.Translation: aaaaam*!!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「じょん
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Jon
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Jon

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゃぁああぁぁーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: gyaaaaaaaaa!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: gyaaaaaaaaa!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 華麗で優美な動きを見せ、真人の額にハイジャンプ反転猫キックをかました!!
MESSAGE.EN: With both beauty and grace, the cat spun 360 degrees and roundhouse kicked him in the forehead!!
MESSAGE.Translation: With both beauty and grace, the cat spun 360 degrees and roundhouse kicked him in the forehead!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ぐふっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Gufu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Gufu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人は倒れた…。
MESSAGE.EN: It knocked him to the floor...
MESSAGE.Translation: It knocked him to the floor...

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ふーっ、ふーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Fwoo, fwoo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Fwoo, fwoo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: お、思いっきり怒ってる…。
MESSAGE.EN: S-She was extremely pissed off...
MESSAGE.Translation: S-She was extremely pissed off...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょ、ちょっと、それくらいにしておかないと、真人が怪我しちゃうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-Hey, if you don't stop, you'll actually hurt Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-Hey, if you don't stop, you'll actually hurt Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「うにゃう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …少し落ち着いたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She seemed to have calmed down some.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She seemed to have calmed down some.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人がのびている横で、僕と黒猫（笹瀬川さん？）は話し合いを始める。
MESSAGE.EN: The two of us, that is the black cat (Sasasegawa-san?) and I, started chatting next to the passed-out Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: The two of us, that is the black cat (Sasasegawa-san?) and I, started chatting next to the passed-out Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…で、笹瀬川さんなんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So, you're Sasasegawa-san, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So, you're Sasasegawa-san, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「にゃうっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meow!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meow!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded.
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded.

MESSAGE.JP: …うわ、改めて考えるとやっぱり絶対おかしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...After having calmed down enough to think straight, all I could think was wow, that whole thing was actually pretty weird...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...After having calmed down enough to think straight, all I could think was wow, that whole thing was actually pretty weird...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…でも、何でこんなことになってるんだろ？　ごめん、僕には全然わかんないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But why is this happening? I'm sorry, but I really have no idea what's going on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But why is this happening? I'm sorry, but I really have no idea what's going on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は額を手で覆う。
MESSAGE.EN: I covered my face.
MESSAGE.Translation: I covered my face.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「うにゅう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Meow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Meow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しょぼーん、と縮こまる笹瀬川さん（黒猫？）。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san (the black cat?) cringed in disappointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san (the black cat?) cringed in disappointment.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、もうほとんど確定なんだから、笹瀬川さんでいいだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I figured I could call the cat Sasasegawa-san since it was pretty much obvious that it was her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I figured I could call the cat Sasasegawa-san since it was pretty much obvious that it was her...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まいったなぁ、こりゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is quite a predicament...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is quite a predicament...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日のついさっき、『不思議なことは起こる』ということを再確認したばっかりだったけど、それでも信じがたい。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite having had reconvinced myself that 'mysterious things' actually happen, I still couldn't wrap my head around this cat transformation thing.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite having had reconvinced myself that 'mysterious things' actually happen, I still couldn't wrap my head around this cat transformation thing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず考えるべきはひとつ。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I knew what we had to focus on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I knew what we had to focus on.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうにかして、元に戻らないと困るよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We've got to find a way to return you to normal...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We've got to find a way to return you to normal...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ふにゃ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝Funyaa～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝Funyaa～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんとかして～、という風に見える。
MESSAGE.EN: It sounded like she was saying ❛do something about this.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It sounded like she was saying ❛do something about this.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば、さっきちょっとの間だけ元に戻ってたけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Come to think of it, you were human for a few moments earlier...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Come to think of it, you were human for a few moments earlier...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 一回戻って、すぐにまた猫になってしまった、はず。
MESSAGE.EN: If I remember right, she did turn back into a human once... but then quickly morphed back into a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: If I remember right, she did turn back into a human once... but then quickly morphed back into a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一瞬でも戻ったってことは、何かしら戻る方法があるってことだと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was just for a moment, but you DID change back. So I'm sure there must be a way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was just for a moment, but you DID change back. So I'm sure there must be a way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まずはそれを見つけないとなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And that's what we have to figure out first.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And that's what we have to figure out first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: とは言ったものの、一体何をすればいいんだろう。全然わからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite the bold statement, I didn't have any idea where to even begin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite the bold statement, I didn't have any idea where to even begin.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりで考えていると。
MESSAGE.EN: While we were lost in thought...
MESSAGE.Translation: While we were lost in thought...

MESSAGE.JP: ぼむっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Pop*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「も、戻りましたわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I'm back!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I'm back!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どういうこと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-How did you do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-How did you do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしが聞きたいですわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That is what I want to know!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That is what I want to know!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「っていうか、やっぱり笹瀬川さんなんだよねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So you really are Sasasegawa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So you really are Sasasegawa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなたの理解が早くて助かりますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I appreciate your quick understanding...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I appreciate your quick understanding...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「とりあえず、戻ったのならわたくしは帰らせていただきますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Anyhow, now that I've returned to normal, will you please excuse me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Anyhow, now that I've returned to normal, will you please excuse me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、でもまたすぐに猫になっちゃうかも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, but you might suddenly turn into a cat again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, but you might suddenly turn into a cat again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もうちょっと慎重に動いてもバチは当たらないと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like you'll lose anything if you err on the side of caution.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like you'll lose anything if you err on the side of caution.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、それはそうですわね…あなたは何か心当たりがありますの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I suppose you are right... Would you happen to know anything about any of this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I suppose you are right... Would you happen to know anything about any of this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、全然無いけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, can't say that I do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, can't say that I do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、状況から推察するくらいはできると思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝However, I think we can come up with some theories based off what's happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝However, I think we can come up with some theories based off what's happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「確かに、それは大切かもしれませんけど…やっぱり帰りますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That might certainly be important... But I would still like to head back to my dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That might certainly be important... But I would still like to head back to my dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ルームメイトの子が心配しますし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝My roommate must be worried...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝My roommate must be worried...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それにその、あまりこんな時間まで男子寮にいるのは、その…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Besides, for a girl to be in the boys' dorm this late at night, it's... well, you know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Besides, for a girl to be in the boys' dorm this late at night, it's... well, you know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、こんなときにそんなこと気にしなくても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think that's the least of your worries at the moment...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think that's the least of your worries at the moment...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そんなことって、ものすごく重要ですわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But it does worry me! This is a grave situation!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But it does worry me! This is a grave situation!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、でもさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝B-But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝B-But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなた、前々から思ってましたけど、相当にお節介ですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You know, I've had this inkling that you really like prying into other's affairs for a while now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You know, I've had this inkling that you really like prying into other's affairs for a while now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そ、そう？　あんまりそういう気はないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh...? I don't really think so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh...? I don't really think so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…でも、助かりましたわ。ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...However, you have been of great help. I truly appreciate it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...However, you have been of great help. I truly appreciate it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そういうわけですから、今日は早々に御暇させていただきますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Now then, I shall excuse myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Now then, I shall excuse myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、夜も遅いから、ベランダから出てった方が良いかも。見付かりにくいし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait, you might wanna leave through the veranda. It's late, and it will be hard to see you in the dark.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait, you might wanna leave through the veranda. It's late, and it will be hard to see you in the dark.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…じゃあ、そうさせていただきますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Very well, I will do as you say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Very well, I will do as you say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「では、ごきげんよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Have a nice night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Have a nice night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんはベランダから出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She stepped outside.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stepped outside.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼむっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Pop*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「う、うにゃーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝M-Meow―――!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝M-Meow―――!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬間、また猫になった!!
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly turned into a cat again!!
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly turned into a cat again!!

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわっ、さ、させせがわさんっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah, Sa-Sasesegawa-san!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah, Sa-Sasesegawa-san!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 噛んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I stuttered.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stuttered.

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「ま、またですわっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝I-I'm a cat again!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝I-I'm a cat again!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だ、だから言ったのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I told you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I told you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「仕方ないでしょう!?　あのままここにいるなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝It's not like I had any other choice now, did I!? How could I stay overnight in your room...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝It's not like I had any other choice now, did I!? How could I stay overnight in your room...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…あ、あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...H-Hold on a sec.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...H-Hold on a sec.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `黒猫@「どうなさったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Black Cat@❝What's the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Black Cat@❝What's the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…言葉、通じてるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're talking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're talking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 再び黒猫の笹瀬川さんを前に、会議を開く。
MESSAGE.EN: We were chatting again, despite the fact that Sasasegawa-san had turned back into a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were chatting again, despite the fact that Sasasegawa-san had turned back into a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに真人は床にねっ転がったまま気持ちよさげな寝息を立てている。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh yeah, Masato was still comfortably sleeping on the floor.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh yeah, Masato was still comfortably sleeping on the floor.

MESSAGE.JP: 毛布をかけてそのまま寝かせてあげることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I covered him with a blanket and let him sleep where he was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I covered him with a blanket and let him sleep where he was.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず、何で話が通じるようになったかは置いておいて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's not worry about how and why we can communicate for the time being...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's not worry about how and why we can communicate for the time being...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、実に奇妙なことだけど、便利だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, despite how odd it is, it's rather handy.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, despite how odd it is, it's rather handy.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「深く考えていたら頭がおかしくなりそうですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝If I were to think about it any more, I would probably go crazy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝If I were to think about it any more, I would probably go crazy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん、信じ難いかもしれないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, I'm sure you won't believe this, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, I'm sure you won't believe this, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こういうことだって、あるのかもしれないって僕は思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I actually believe things like this happen from time to time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I actually believe things like this happen from time to time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「な、なんですの？　妙に落ち着いてますわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-What is with you? You seem to be strangely calm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-What is with you? You seem to be strangely calm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや…僕だって、そんなに落ち着いてるわけじゃないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No... I'm not that calm, either...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No... I'm not that calm, either...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …でも、僕自身もこういう体験をしてきたから。
MESSAGE.EN: ...But I am speaking from experience.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But I am speaking from experience.

MESSAGE.JP: 夢の世界で、永遠に繰り返す一学期。
MESSAGE.EN: That dream world where we eternally repeated our first semester.
MESSAGE.Translation: That dream world where we eternally repeated our first semester.

MESSAGE.JP: それに比べれば、猫になったり戻ったりするなんて、瑣末な出来事だとも思えるくらい。
MESSAGE.EN: Comparing it to that, having someone transform into a cat seemed almost trivial.
MESSAGE.Translation: Comparing it to that, having someone transform into a cat seemed almost trivial.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ううぅ…情けなくて涙が出てきますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uuu... I feel so miserable that I'm tearing up...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uuu... I feel so miserable that I'm tearing up...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…気持ちはわかるけど、とにかくまずは戻る方法を探そうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-Yeah... I know the feeling. However, the first thing we need to do is figure out a way to turn you back into a human.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-Yeah... I know the feeling. However, the first thing we need to do is figure out a way to turn you back into a human.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そんなこと言われても、わたくしには皆目見当がつきませんわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝E-Easy for you to say, but I honestly have no idea what's causing it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝E-Easy for you to say, but I honestly have no idea what's causing it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んがーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmmgaahhh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmmgaahhh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人がでかいいびきを立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was snoring so loudly.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was snoring so loudly.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「うるさいですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So noisy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So noisy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ちょっと、さっさと起きてベッドにでも戻りなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hey, wake up and get in your bed already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hey, wake up and get in your bed already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 肉球でびしびし、と頬を叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She smacked Masato on the cheek a couple times with her paw.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smacked Masato on the cheek a couple times with her paw.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んごーっ…うへへ、そんなにカツばっかり食えねえよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmmmgooohhh... Uhehe, I can't eat that many pork cutlets...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmmmgooohhh... Uhehe, I can't eat that many pork cutlets...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ…そんな寝言本当に言うんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sheesh... I've never actually heard anyone say something like that in their sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sheesh... I've never actually heard anyone say something like that in their sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「アホですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What a clown.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What a clown.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、真人は置いておいて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, let's leave him be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, let's leave him be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「少なくとも、今僕の前で二回は元に戻ってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝For starters, you've been able to return to your normal self twice in front of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝For starters, you've been able to return to your normal self twice in front of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「その二回の共通点を探そう。それが方法に繋がるかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We should think about what those two times had in common. That could help us figure it out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We should think about what those two times had in common. That could help us figure it out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「は、はぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、どうしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いえ…あなたがこんな性格だとは知りませんでしたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I mean... I didn't know you had a serious side to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I mean... I didn't know you had a serious side to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、どんなもなにも、僕はこういう性格だけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, say what you will, but this is just how I am...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, say what you will, but this is just how I am...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もっと情けないと思われてたんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered just how unreliable she thought I was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered just how unreliable she thought I was.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…助かりますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I appreciate that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I appreciate that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、でも、あんまり頼りにされても困るかもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, but you might not wanna count on me too much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, but you might not wanna count on me too much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言ってしまえば、僕はほんの少し『慣れてる』だけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: To be frank, I was merely somewhat ❛used to❜ things like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: To be frank, I was merely somewhat ❛used to❜ things like this.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ところで、先に一つよろしいかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝By the way, might I ask a favor of you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝By the way, might I ask a favor of you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「言葉が通じるんでしたら、ルームメイトの子に連絡を入れたいんですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Being that we're able to converse with one another, I would like to call my roommate.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Being that we're able to converse with one another, I would like to call my roommate.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あの子、ほっといたら何時まででも待っていそうですし、ひとまずは安心だと伝えておかないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'm certain she would stay up all night waiting for me, so I must let her know I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'm certain she would stay up all night waiting for me, so I must let her know I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sure...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sure...❞

MESSAGE.JP: こっちから見たら、笹瀬川さんの気配りが意外な気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't expect her to be so worried about her roommate.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't expect her to be so worried about her roommate.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…いや）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...No.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...No.)

MESSAGE.JP: 後輩から慕われてるって、そういうのもあるのかなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: That may be why those younger girls worshiped her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That may be why those younger girls worshiped her.

MESSAGE.JP: まあちょっと、慕われっぷりの程度は異常に見えるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Though, the amount they loved her seemed a little abnormal...
MESSAGE.Translation: Though, the amount they loved her seemed a little abnormal...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…携帯、貸していただけます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...May I use your cellphone?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...May I use your cellphone?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんの前に僕の携帯を置く。
MESSAGE.EN: I set my cell phone in front of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I set my cell phone in front of her.

MESSAGE.JP: 肉球でペしペし叩く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was hitting the buttons with her paw.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was hitting the buttons with her paw.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How do I explain it...
MESSAGE.Translation: How do I explain it...

MESSAGE.JP: 一生懸命操作しようとしてるのはわかるけど、見た目が猫だけに、携帯にじゃれてるみたいで可愛い。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite knowing that she was trying her hardest to make a call, as a cat, she appeared to be simply playing with my phone; it was incredibly cute.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite knowing that she was trying her hardest to make a call, as a cat, she appeared to be simply playing with my phone; it was incredibly cute.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、操作できませんわ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I cannot push the buttons～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I cannot push the buttons～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ちょっと、呆けてないで手伝っていただけます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Excuse me, would you please stop watching and give me a hand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Excuse me, would you please stop watching and give me a hand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめん…なんか可愛かったから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry... You were just acting so cute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, sorry... You were just acting so cute.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「か、かか、可愛いって、そんな、こと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝C-C-C-Cute? I-I hardly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝C-C-C-Cute? I-I hardly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやー、だって笹瀬川さん、猫だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know, since you're a cat now, Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know, since you're a cat now, Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、ああ、そうですわね、猫ですものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A-Ah, yes, you're right, I am a cat right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A-Ah, yes, you're right, I am a cat right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、鈴の猫とかもね、なんかこうじゃれてるの見てると和む…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right. Truth be told, it's always relaxing to watch Rin's cats playi...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right. Truth be told, it's always relaxing to watch Rin's cats playi...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いいからさっさと操作しなさいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Shut up and dial my roommate's number for me already!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Shut up and dial my roommate's number for me already!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 遮って一喝される。
MESSAGE.EN: She snapped at me before I could even finish speaking.
MESSAGE.Translation: She snapped at me before I could even finish speaking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, s-sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, s-sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて携帯を手に取った。
MESSAGE.EN: I quickly picked up my cell phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I quickly picked up my cell phone.

MESSAGE.JP: 今の僕は猫より弱いんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Could I have been weaker than a cat...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Could I have been weaker than a cat...?

MESSAGE.JP: よく考えるとひどい図な気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like I was witnessing something truly unfortunate.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like I was witnessing something truly unfortunate.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと、ルームメイトって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, who is your roommate?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, who is your roommate?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「か、神北さんですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ka-Kamikita-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ka-Kamikita-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、やっぱりそうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ahh, that's who it was.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ahh, that's who it was.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…ちゃんと言わないでいたのね、あの子」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...It seems that she's kept her promise and hasn't told anyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...It seems that she's kept her promise and hasn't told anyone.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗鈴と仲の悪いわたくしと、あの子がルームメイトなんて、何かしら波風の原因になりそうでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well, seeing as how I'm on poor terms with Rin Natsume, don't you think finding out that I'm her roommate would hinder their friendship?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well, seeing as how I'm on poor terms with Rin Natsume, don't you think finding out that I'm her roommate would hinder their friendship?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そんなの、気にしないでいいと思うけどなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I doubted she would have to worry about something like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I doubted she would have to worry about something like that.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず小毬さんにコールして、笹瀬川さんの前に携帯を置く。
MESSAGE.EN: I punched in Komari-san's number and placed the phone in front of Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I punched in Komari-san's number and placed the phone in front of Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『もしもし～』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Hello～?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Hello～?]

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと声が聞こえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could still make out her muffled voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could still make out her muffled voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 気を遣って一歩離れることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a step back so they could talk in private.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a step back so they could talk in private.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ああ、わたくしですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah, it's me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah, it's me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ちょっと、神北さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hello, Kamikita-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hello, Kamikita-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「にゃーじゃないですわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would you stop meowing!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would you stop meowing!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「きーっ!!　ば、馬鹿にしてるんですのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Kiiiiii!! A-Are you making a mockery of me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Kiiiiii!! A-Are you making a mockery of me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「もしもーし!!　にゃーにゃーうるさいですわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Now talk to me!! And no more meows!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Now talk to me!! And no more meows!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとまった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hang on a second.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hang on a second.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何ですのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしかして通じてないんじゃない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Perhaps she doesn't understand what you're saying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Perhaps she doesn't understand what you're saying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そんなっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-That's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-That's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯を取る。
MESSAGE.EN: I picked up the phone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I picked up the phone.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『にゃーっ、にゃーっ？　にゃにゃー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Meow, meow? Meow meow.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Meow, meow? Meow meow.]

MESSAGE.JP: 一生懸命猫語（？）を話す小毬さん。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san was trying her best to speak cat(?).
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san was trying her best to speak cat(?).

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、にゃーとしか聞こえてなかったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: As I'd suspected, all she heard was a cat meowing.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I'd suspected, all she heard was a cat meowing.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『あっ、り、理樹君』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Oh, Ri-Riki-kun.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Oh, Ri-Riki-kun.]

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『なんだか今理樹君の携帯から、猫さんが電話掛けてきたんだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[It sounded like a cat was trying to talk to me through your cell phone.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[It sounded like a cat was trying to talk to me through your cell phone.]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…話せばすごく長くなるんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, well... This is gonna be a long story.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, well... This is gonna be a long story.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そんな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I do not believe this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I do not believe this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 両手をついてうなだれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was down on all fours, hanging her head in despair.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was down on all fours, hanging her head in despair.

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、猫だからいつも両手はついた体勢なんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, being a cat, she was always on all fours.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, being a cat, she was always on all fours.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきの、笹瀬川さんなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『ふえ？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Fue?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Fue?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…信じられないだろうけど、笹瀬川さんだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You're not going to believe this, but that was Sasasegawa-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You're not going to believe this, but that was Sasasegawa-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『にゃーさんがさーちゃん？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Meow-san is Sa-chan?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Meow-san is Sa-chan?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, that's right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あの子がすんなり理解してくれるとは思えないですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I hardly think she'll comprehend this so easily...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I hardly think she'll comprehend this so easily...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、まあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『よくわからないけど…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[I'm not quite sure what's going on, but...]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[I'm not quite sure what's going on, but...]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『さーちゃんが猫さんの真似がすごいうまいってのはわかったよ』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[I can tell she's very good at mimicking a cat.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[I can tell she's very good at mimicking a cat.]

MESSAGE.JP: 見事にわかってない。
MESSAGE.EN: She misunderstood beautifully.
MESSAGE.Translation: She misunderstood beautifully.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…長くなりそうですし、今日は帰れないとだけ伝えてくださる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...It seems that this will take a rather long time, so could you merely tell her that I won't be returning tonight?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...It seems that this will take a rather long time, so could you merely tell her that I won't be returning tonight?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、状況は伝えないと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But I should probably tell her what's going on with you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But I should probably tell her what's going on with you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「電話じゃ無理ですわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You won't be able to do that through the phone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You won't be able to do that through the phone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かにそうかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized she was right.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized she was right.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「どうしましたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What is the matter?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What is the matter?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なんか冷静に猫に諭されてるっていう図がシュールだなぁって思って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I was just thinking that receiving rational advice from a cat is kind of peculiar...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I was just thinking that receiving rational advice from a cat is kind of peculiar...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「思わずなんかツッコミを入れたくなっちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And instinctively felt like smacking myself on the head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And instinctively felt like smacking myself on the head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そんなこと、どうでもいいですわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That is utterly irrelevant...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That is utterly irrelevant...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『理樹君、さーちゃんどうかしたの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Riki-kun, has something happened to Sa-chan?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Riki-kun, has something happened to Sa-chan?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ちょっと今日は帰れないって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, she won't be able to return to your room tonight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, she won't be able to return to your room tonight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『ふえ??』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Fue?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Fue?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとね、すぐには話せない複雑な事情があるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a complicated reason which she can't tell you right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a complicated reason which she can't tell you right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『さーちゃん、どうかしたの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[What's happened to her?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[What's happened to her?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、猫になっちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, she's turned into a cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, she's turned into a cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『ふえぇ???』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Fuee???]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Fuee???]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…話進みませんから、そこはスルーしてくださいます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...This won't get us anywhere. Would you just skip that bit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...This won't get us anywhere. Would you just skip that bit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: また突っ込まれた。
MESSAGE.EN: Another piece of rational advice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Another piece of rational advice.

MESSAGE.JP: 存在自体がボケみたいな今の笹瀬川さんに突っ込まれまくりなのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I kept receiving advice from Sasasegawa-san, whose very existence was like some kind of joke now...
MESSAGE.Translation: I kept receiving advice from Sasasegawa-san, whose very existence was like some kind of joke now...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『うーん、さーちゃんは今日は帰れないんだね？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Hmm, so Sa-chan won't be returning tonight?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Hmm, so Sa-chan won't be returning tonight?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、それと、今日だけじゃなくて、しばらく帰れないかもしれないんだ。明日詳しく話すよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No. And actually, she probably won't be able to return for a while. I'll explain everything tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No. And actually, she probably won't be able to return for a while. I'll explain everything tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『え、じゃあ学校は？　病気なの？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Eh? What about school? Is she sick?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Eh? What about school? Is she sick?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…元気といえば元気なんだけど、ちょっと学校は難しいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm... You could actually say she's fine, but it's a little difficult for her to go to school at the moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm... You could actually say she's fine, but it's a little difficult for her to go to school at the moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『そっかー、元気なんだね。わかったよ～』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[I see. If she's okay, that's good enough for me～.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[I see. If she's okay, that's good enough for me～.]

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『じゃあ、さーちゃんは理樹君と一緒なんだね』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[So, she's with you then, isn't she?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[So, she's with you then, isn't she?]

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、今日は男子寮にいることになるかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, she'll have to stay in the boys' dorm tonight.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, she'll have to stay in the boys' dorm tonight.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『ふえー、そうなんだー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Fuee, I see.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Fuee, I see.]

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『…ええっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[...Eeehhh!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[...Eeehhh!!]

MESSAGE.JP: ワンテンポ遅い。
MESSAGE.EN: Her surprise was somewhat belated.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her surprise was somewhat belated.

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『じゃ、じゃじゃあ、さーちゃんと理樹君は真夜中のらんでびゅー…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[D-D-Does that mean you and Sa-chan are having a late-night rendezvous...?]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[D-D-Does that mean you and Sa-chan are having a late-night rendezvous...?]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…貸しなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Give me the phone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Give me the phone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんが携帯をひったくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She batted the phone out of my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She batted the phone out of my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: すう、と息を一つ吸い込むと。
MESSAGE.EN: She then drew in one deep breath.
MESSAGE.Translation: She then drew in one deep breath.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「つべこべ言わずにさっさとお風呂入って寝なさーいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Stop spouting nonsense, take a bath, and go to bed already!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Stop spouting nonsense, take a bath, and go to bed already!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@『ほわあぁぁっ、にゃーしか聞こえないけどごめんなさーいっ!!』
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@[Howaahh! I could only hear a series of meows, but I'm so sorry!!]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@[Howaahh! I could only hear a series of meows, but I'm so sorry!!]

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まったく…世話の焼ける子ですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Geez... She's such a handful...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Geez... She's such a handful...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …相変らず小毬さんは弱かった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Komari-san was as weak-willed as ever.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Komari-san was as weak-willed as ever.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず電話は切れているみたいだったので、携帯は閉じて机の上に置く。
MESSAGE.EN: Since the call ended, I picked my phone up, closed it, and put it on my desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since the call ended, I picked my phone up, closed it, and put it on my desk.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ああぁ…でもこれじゃ、あなたと男子寮で過ごすと思われますのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Aahh... But now she must be thinking I'll be staying with you in the boys' dorm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Aahh... But now she must be thinking I'll be staying with you in the boys' dorm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、そこは大丈夫だよ。だって笹瀬川さん、猫だし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to worry about that, Sasasegawa-san. You're a cat, after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think you need to worry about that, Sasasegawa-san. You're a cat, after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「きっと真相を知ったら、『うそーんっ、いや、でも猫じゃしょうがないよなぁ』って納得してくれるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If people find out the truth, they'll be like 'oh my... but wait, since you were a cat, it's fine,' and think nothing of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If people find out the truth, they'll be like 'oh my... but wait, since you were a cat, it's fine,' and think nothing of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そんな能天気なのーみその持ち主ばかりであることを祈りますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I can only hope everybody's as idiotic as that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I can only hope everybody's as idiotic as that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…でも、また一つおかしなことが増えたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...But we now have another riddle to solve.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...But we now have another riddle to solve.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That we do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That we do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何で僕だけ笹瀬川さんの言葉が解るんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: Why was I the only one who could understand her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why was I the only one who could understand her?

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたらそこに鍵があるのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought that was probably the most important key to solving the whole mystery.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought that was probably the most important key to solving the whole mystery.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼむっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Pop*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あっ、また戻りましたわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah, I'm back again!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah, I'm back again!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「げ、原因がさっぱりわからないですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝W-What could cause this? I have no idea whatsoever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝W-What could cause this? I have no idea whatsoever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（まてよ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Hold on a sec...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Hold on a sec...)

MESSAGE.JP: 最初に戻ったときのことを思い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled the first time she reverted back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled the first time she reverted back.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さん、一番最初に猫になってから、男子寮に来るまではずっと猫のままだったんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, you had been in cat form until the boys' dorm, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sasasegawa-san, you had been in cat form until the boys' dorm, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「え？　ええ…二時間ほどは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Eh? Yes... For roughly two hours.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Eh? Yes... For roughly two hours.❞

MESSAGE.JP: つまり、ここに来るまでは全く変化なし。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, there had been no transformations on her way here.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, there had been no transformations on her way here.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「来てから、ちょくちょく猫になったり戻ったりを繰り返してるんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And after arriving here, you've kept changing back and forth randomly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And after arriving here, you've kept changing back and forth randomly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ということは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Which means...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Which means...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「変身のサイクルが変わったのはこの部屋に来てから、ってことなんじゃないかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Doesn't it seem like your transformation cycle has changed since you came into this room...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Doesn't it seem like your transformation cycle has changed since you came into this room...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃあ、ここに原因が？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So this place is the cause?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So this place is the cause?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはわからないけど…少なくとも今まで笹瀬川さんがここにくることはなかったしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I can't say... Though I at least know you've never been here before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I can't say... Though I at least know you've never been here before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう考えると、戻ることができるのはここに何かがあるから、ってことかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And following that line of reasoning, you could say there's something in this room that causes you to change back into a human.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And following that line of reasoning, you could say there's something in this room that causes you to change back into a human.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思い出してみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought back.

MESSAGE.JP: 最初に元に戻ったのは、僕らが寝静まってからすぐ。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned back into a human shortly after Masato fell asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned back into a human shortly after Masato fell asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: その前にあったことは…。
MESSAGE.EN: And before that...
MESSAGE.Translation: And before that...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人が肉球で眼に攻撃を受けた。
MESSAGE.EN: She had swatted Masato in the eye.
MESSAGE.Translation: She had swatted Masato in the eye.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんとクドが部屋に来た。
MESSAGE.EN: And before that, Nishizono-san and Kud had come over.
MESSAGE.Translation: And before that, Nishizono-san and Kud had come over.

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、その前に謙吾に会った。
MESSAGE.EN: No, even before those things, she and I had run into Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, even before those things, she and I had run into Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: あと考えられるのは、寝てる間に何かがあった、ってことくらい。
MESSAGE.EN: If not those, then all I could think of is something happened while Masato and I were asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: If not those, then all I could think of is something happened while Masato and I were asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: …これだけじゃ特定するのは無理だ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I needed more clues to figure out the answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I needed more clues to figure out the answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、戻るときは割と唐突なんだよねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, all I currently know is that you turn back without warning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, all I currently know is that you turn back without warning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「猫になってしまうほうが問題ですわ。そっちのほうは何か気付いたことはありませんの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Me turning into a cat is by far more important. Have you figured anything out in regards to that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Me turning into a cat is by far more important. Have you figured anything out in regards to that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、順番に考えてみようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I think we should figure things out in order.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I think we should figure things out in order.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず、猫になるときに気付いたこと…うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, about you becoming a cat... Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, about you becoming a cat... Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の目の前で猫になったときは…。
MESSAGE.EN: She had reverted back into her cat form when...
MESSAGE.Translation: She had reverted back into her cat form when...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人が起きたときだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It was just when Masato woke up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It was just when Masato woke up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃ、じゃあこのむさくるしい筋肉ダルマが原因ですのねっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-Then that disgusting muscle Dharma doll is the culprit!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-Then that disgusting muscle Dharma doll is the culprit!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんが真人の胸倉をとっ捕まえる。
MESSAGE.EN: She seized Masato by the shirt.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seized Masato by the shirt.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んごー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmgooo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmgooo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それでもなお寝てる…。
MESSAGE.EN: But he was still fast asleep...
MESSAGE.Translation: But he was still fast asleep...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ま、まあ…まだそうと決まったわけじゃないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-Well... It's still only a possibility...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-Well... It's still only a possibility...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 次を考えよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Let's think of something else.
MESSAGE.Translation: Let's think of something else.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほっぺたをぐりぐりされた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You pinched my cheeks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You pinched my cheeks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…真面目に考えてます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Are you being serious here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Are you being serious here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: すごい眼で睨まれた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She glared at me in irritation ...
MESSAGE.Translation: She glared at me in irritation ...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「十分真面目だけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm being as serious as I can...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm being as serious as I can...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃあ、あなたのほっペをぐりぐりしたら猫になるんですわね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So you're seriously going to say that I'll turn back into a cat if I pinch your cheeks?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So you're seriously going to say that I'll turn back into a cat if I pinch your cheeks?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうかもしれない!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It might!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It might!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃあやってみますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝All right, then, I will give it a try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝All right, then, I will give it a try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: むんず。
MESSAGE.EN: *Grip*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Grip*.

MESSAGE.JP: しまった、これは…。
MESSAGE.EN: Uwah, this is gonna...
MESSAGE.Translation: Uwah, this is gonna...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひはひっ、
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hhat hurhts!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hhat hurhts!

MESSAGE.JP: ひはいっへ!!
MESSAGE.EN: Hurhths!
MESSAGE.Translation: Hurhths!

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「変わりませんわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I didn't change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I didn't change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うぅ…軽率でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uu... I should've given it more thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uu... I should've given it more thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 次を考えよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to come up with something else...
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to come up with something else...

MESSAGE.JP: そこからさらに元に戻ったときだ。
MESSAGE.EN: What had happened after that?
MESSAGE.Translation: What had happened after that?

MESSAGE.JP: あの時は…。
MESSAGE.EN: After that...
MESSAGE.Translation: After that...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人を攻撃したときだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You attacked Masato!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You attacked Masato!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「やっぱりこの筋肉ダルマが原因ですのねっ!?　ぶっ飛ばして差し上げますわぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I knew it! This muscle Dharma doll is behind all this! I shall make short work of him!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I knew it! This muscle Dharma doll is behind all this! I shall make short work of him!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わああっ、ちょっと待ったぁっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whaaaa, hold on!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whaaaa, hold on!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: うかつなことを言いすぎた…。
MESSAGE.EN: I regretted saying that so thoughtlessly...
MESSAGE.Translation: I regretted saying that so thoughtlessly...

MESSAGE.JP: 何とか笹瀬川さんの怒りを収めることに成功した。
MESSAGE.EN: I somehow managed to fend off her anger.
MESSAGE.Translation: I somehow managed to fend off her anger.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、とりあえずだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, anyways...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, anyways...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「タイミング的には、ちょうどそういう感じだと思うんだよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I believe it was around that time...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I believe it was around that time...❞

MESSAGE.JP: もう一度考えてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about it for another moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about it for another moment.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ？
MESSAGE.EN: Wait a minute.
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait a minute.

MESSAGE.JP: 肉球で眼を攻撃した、フライングネコキックで気絶させた、寝てるところに肉球で頬を叩いた…。
MESSAGE.EN: First she attacked his eyes, then she knocked him out with a flying kick, and finally she slapped his cheeks while he was sleeping...
MESSAGE.Translation: First she attacked his eyes, then she knocked him out with a flying kick, and finally she slapped his cheeks while he was sleeping...

MESSAGE.JP: 真人を攻撃した数と戻った数が一致する…!?
MESSAGE.EN: The number of attacks matched the times she's reverted...!?
MESSAGE.Translation: The number of attacks matched the times she's reverted...!?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいや、そんなバカな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, that can't be it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, that can't be it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…この筋肉ダルマは関係ありませんの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Are you sure this muscle Dharma doll has nothing to do with it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Are you sure this muscle Dharma doll has nothing to do with it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…理由はふたつあるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes... And here are two reasons why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes... And here are two reasons why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まず、真人が笹瀬川さんをネコにするメリットが何もない。なにより、真人がこんなことをするはずが無いんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First, he has nothing to gain from turning you into a kitten. Besides, there's no way he'd do something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First, he has nothing to gain from turning you into a kitten. Besides, there's no way he'd do something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人がそういう悪戯をするような人じゃない、ってのは僕が保証するよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He doesn't prank people like that. I swear.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He doesn't prank people like that. I swear.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「次に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And second...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And second...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人が原因での事態だったら…間違いなく筋肉が絡むはずなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If he were the culprit... muscles would somehow be involved with it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If he were the culprit... muscles would somehow be involved with it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「猫にするなんていうのは真人の美学に反するはずだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Turning someone into a cat isn't his style...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Turning someone into a cat isn't his style...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「最初の理由より、後の理由の方が説得力あるってのも嫌ですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I hate to admit this, but the second reason makes even more sense than the first one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I hate to admit this, but the second reason makes even more sense than the first one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん。笹瀬川さんがマッスルになってたら、間違いなく真人の仕業だったんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. If you had transformed into muscle, the culprit would've definitely been Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. If you had transformed into muscle, the culprit would've definitely been Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「想像したくもないですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I do not wish to even imagine that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I do not wish to even imagine that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だから、真人が悪いわけじゃないと思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝With that, I suppose we can rule him out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝With that, I suppose we can rule him out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…なにか、積極的にこの男を容疑者から外そうとしてるように見えますけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...It seems like you're trying to purposely rule him out for some reason.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...It seems like you're trying to purposely rule him out for some reason.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えっ？　そういうわけじゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? No, I'm not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? No, I'm not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まあ、いいですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well, whatever...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well, whatever...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「幼なじみですものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You two are childhood friends, are you not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You two are childhood friends, are you not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、このことはとりあえずまだわからないから、話進むんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And I'm still not quite sure about this, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And I'm still not quite sure about this, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これはかなり自信がある説なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have one theory I'm rather confident about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have one theory I'm rather confident about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「な、なんですのそれは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A-And what would that theory be?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A-And what would that theory be?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この部屋から出ると、猫になるんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Leaving the room turns you into a cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Leaving the room turns you into a cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここに来るまではずっと猫だったんだよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were a cat the whole time before you got here, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were a cat the whole time before you got here, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そんなっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Y-You mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Y-You mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「元に戻り方がわからないうちに試すのも怖いけど…多分、さっきと同じようにサッシから出ると、猫になると思うんだ」
