MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm kind of afraid to have you try it when we don't know how to turn you back, but I think you'll turn into a cat if you leave through the window like earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm kind of afraid to have you try it when we don't know how to turn you back, but I think you'll turn into a cat if you leave through the window like earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃああなた、原因がわかるまでずっとここで生活しろっていうんですのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Are you saying that I have to live here until we figure out the cause!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Are you saying that I have to live here until we figure out the cause!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、いや、僕が言ってるわけじゃないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝N-No, I'm not saying you have to do anything...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝N-No, I'm not saying you have to do anything...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろん、さっきのは他の何かが原因で、たまたま出た瞬間だったかもしれないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course, there might be another cause, and you simply triggered it when you went outside...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course, there might be another cause, and you simply triggered it when you went outside...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「でも、他の場合はここから外に出たわけじゃありませんわよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But it is not like I was trying to leave the other time it happened.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But it is not like I was trying to leave the other time it happened.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「原因が一つだって決まってるわけじゃないしね。トリガーはいくつあってもおかしくないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We can't be sure there's only one trigger. There could be a lot more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We can't be sure there's only one trigger. There could be a lot more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、それもそうですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-That is true...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-That is true...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふわぁ…なんだか戻ったら眠くなってきましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝*Yawn*... I'm getting sleepy now that I'm human again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝*Yawn*... I'm getting sleepy now that I'm human again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、じゃあもう寝て明日にする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then do you want to go to bed and continue this tomorrow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then do you want to go to bed and continue this tomorrow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そんなのんきなことを言ってる場合ですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Can we afford to waste time like that in this situation?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Can we afford to waste time like that in this situation?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もちろん、まだ起きてるなら僕も起きてるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, if you want to stay up, I'll stay up with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, if you want to stay up, I'll stay up with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だいたい、寝る場所って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Besides, where... would you expect me to sleep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Besides, where... would you expect me to sleep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん、真人のベッドが空いてるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm, you can use Masato's bed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm, you can use Masato's bed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「お・こ・と・わ・りですわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ab-so-lute-ly not!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ab-so-lute-ly not!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何故わたくしがこの汗臭そうなベッドで…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Why should I sleep in a bed that reeks of sweat...!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Why should I sleep in a bed that reeks of sweat...!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ああっ、それもこのわたくしに二度も!!　二回も!!　辱めをっ…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Aah! And on the top of that, twice!! He humiliated me twice...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Aah! And on the top of that, twice!! He humiliated me twice...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…なにそれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなたも見てたでしょう!?　わ、わたくしの、その…見るわ、触るわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You saw it, didn't you!? H-He... looked at and touched my... my...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You saw it, didn't you!? H-He... looked at and touched my... my...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー…猫になってるときの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... when you were a cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... when you were a cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 凶暴になってた理由がようやく解った。
MESSAGE.EN: I had finally figured out the reason behind her violent behavior.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had finally figured out the reason behind her violent behavior.

MESSAGE.JP: そりゃ、女の子にそんなことしたら怒る。
MESSAGE.EN: Any girl would have probably gotten mad.
MESSAGE.Translation: Any girl would have probably gotten mad.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「思い出したら、またひっぱたいてやりたくなってきましたわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Now that I've been reminded of that, I'm starting to get an urge to slap him again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Now that I've been reminded of that, I'm starting to get an urge to slap him again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあ…猫だったんだし、しょうがないよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There there... You were a cat, so you can't really blame him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There there... You were a cat, so you can't really blame him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ううぅ…な、情けなくなってきましたわぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uu... I-I am starting to feel completely wretched...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uu... I-I am starting to feel completely wretched...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほらほら、とりあえず今日はもう寝ようよ。せっかく元に戻ってるんだしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look, I think you should get some sleep while you can. After all, you're yourself at the moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look, I think you should get some sleep while you can. After all, you're yourself at the moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なんだか、頼れそうなのがあなただけというのも不安ですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You know, knowing that you are the only one I can rely on right now worries me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You know, knowing that you are the only one I can rely on right now worries me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやー…まあ、確かに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I suppose so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I suppose so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…とりあえず、ちょっと席を外しますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Anyhow, would you excuse me for a bit...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Anyhow, would you excuse me for a bit...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 立ち上がり、ドアへ向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: She got to her feet and walked toward the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: She got to her feet and walked toward the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼむ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Pop*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふにゃーーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Meowwwww!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Meowwwww!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫になった。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned back into a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned back into a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、やっぱり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I knew it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I knew it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そういうのは先に言ってくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝C-Could you have said something before I tried to leave!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝C-Could you have said something before I tried to leave!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、言ったんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I did...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I did...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「用事なら、僕が代わりに行ってこようか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you need something, I'll go get it for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you need something, I'll go get it for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あなたに代わってもらえる用事じゃありませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-This is not something you can do for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-This is not something you can do for me.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、ひょっとしてトイレ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, you wanna use the bathroom, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, you wanna use the bathroom, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ちょっと、あまりそういうことを女性に言わせないでいただけます!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Excuse me, but would you not ask a lady something like that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Excuse me, but would you not ask a lady something like that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、ご、ごめん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, I-I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, I-I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、さっきの『この部屋から出ると猫化』説は正しいみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Anyway, my theory seemed correct: leaving the room made her turn into a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Anyway, my theory seemed correct: leaving the room made her turn into a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、どうしよう…猫のままうろつくのもあんまりよくないよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, how will you get there...? I don't think it would be wise to wander around the dorm as a cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, how will you get there...? I don't think it would be wise to wander around the dorm as a cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「み、見付からないようにはしますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I will do my best to stay hidden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I will do my best to stay hidden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだ、ちょっとお皿に砂入れてくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know! I'll go get a plate and put some sand on it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know! I'll go get a plate and put some sand on it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「は？　何に使いますの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Huh? What for?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Huh? What for?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「猫トイレを作るんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To make a litter box for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To make a litter box for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴が前に作ってたんだよ。こう、新聞紙に…
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I saw Rin make one with newspa...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I saw Rin make one with newspa...

MESSAGE.JP: いたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: ouch!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ouch!❞

MESSAGE.JP: なぐられた。
MESSAGE.EN: She hit me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hit me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふ・ざ・け・て・ま・す・のっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would - you - care - to - repeat - that!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would - you - care - to - repeat - that!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: だって猫なんだもん…。
MESSAGE.EN: But you are a cat...
MESSAGE.Translation: But you are a cat...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、笹瀬川さんは猫のままトイレに向かったみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She ended up heading to the restroom as a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She ended up heading to the restroom as a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: …水に落ちなきゃいいけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I hoped she wouldn't fall into the toilet.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I hoped she wouldn't fall into the toilet.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局僕が真人のベッドで、笹瀬川さんが僕のベッドで寝ることになった。
MESSAGE.EN: We eventually decided that I would sleep in Masato's bed while she slept in mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: We eventually decided that I would sleep in Masato's bed while she slept in mine.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ううぅ…な、情けないですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uuu... W-What a disgrace...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uuu... W-What a disgrace...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに下で寝ている笹瀬川さんは、まだ猫のままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, she ended up sleeping down there as a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, she ended up sleeping down there as a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ひとまず、明日から本格的に動き出そうよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's officially start working on this issue tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, let's officially start working on this issue tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ええ…一刻も早く原因を突き止めないと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Yes... I need to find out what's causing this as quickly as possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Yes... I need to find out what's causing this as quickly as possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…じゃ、おやすみ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright... then, good night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright... then, good night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「うぅ…女子寮のベッドが恋しいですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uu... I miss my bed in the girls' dorm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uu... I miss my bed in the girls' dorm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んごー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hmgooo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hmgooo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 床で寝る真人のいびきが響き渡る。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato's snoring echoed throughout the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato's snoring echoed throughout the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「うるさいですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So noisy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So noisy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん…しょうがないからさ、我慢してあげて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y-Yeah... Unfortunately you'll need to bear with it; he does that every night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y-Yeah... Unfortunately you'll need to bear with it; he does that every night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「神北さんの寝言よりはマシかしらね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I suppose this is no worse than Kamikita-san's somniloquy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I suppose this is no worse than Kamikita-san's somniloquy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー…なんか解るかも…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... I can kind of picture it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... I can kind of picture it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: きっと『ちょうちょ～』とか言いながら、夢の中でもお花畑に違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure her dreams revolved around her chasing a butterfly through a field of flowers.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure her dreams revolved around her chasing a butterfly through a field of flowers.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「匂いも落ち着きませんわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And the smell here makes me uncomfortable...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And the smell here makes me uncomfortable...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃ、僕がいつも寝てるベッドだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know, that's my bed you're talking about...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know, that's my bed you're talking about...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あなたの…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Y-Your bed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Y-Your bed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「原因みつかるまではちょっと我慢してね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but you'll need to bear with it until we figure this out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry, but you'll need to bear with it until we figure this out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「え、ええ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝R-Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝R-Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そんなに匂う？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, does it smell that terrible?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, does it smell that terrible?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そそっ、そうじゃなくて、殿方の…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I-I didn't mean it like that. It's just... I've never been in a man's...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I-I didn't mean it like that. It's just... I've never been in a man's...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何でもありませんわよっ!!　おやすみなさいませっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Never mind!! Good night!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Never mind!! Good night!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ばふっ、と布団の中に潜り込む音がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard her crawl under the blanket.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard her crawl under the blanket.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「うぅ…やっぱり情けないですわぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uu～... I still feel disgraced...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uu～... I still feel disgraced...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら、僕も何とかするからさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Look, I'm gonna help you deal with this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Look, I'm gonna help you deal with this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日はとりあえず寝ようよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So we're getting a good night's sleep, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So we're getting a good night's sleep, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「えぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …やっぱり、相当堪えてるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She seemed to be willing to put up with it in the end.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She seemed to be willing to put up with it in the end.

MESSAGE.JP: 程なくして、下から寝息が聞こえてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard the sound of someone sleeping peacefully below me a few moments later.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard the sound of someone sleeping peacefully below me a few moments later.

MESSAGE.JP: 覗いてみると、制服姿の笹瀬川さんがそこに寝ていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a quick peek, and found Sasasegawa-san sleeping in her school uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a quick peek, and found Sasasegawa-san sleeping in her school uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（戻ったんだ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(She's back...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(She's back...)

MESSAGE.JP: どういうことなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Just what was going on with her?
MESSAGE.Translation: Just what was going on with her?

MESSAGE.JP: 寝る前に、もう一度よく考えてみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to go over everything once more before sleeping.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to go over everything once more before sleeping.

MESSAGE.JP: 落ち着いて見直してみると。
MESSAGE.EN: I focused my attention and reviewed everything that had occurred so far.
MESSAGE.Translation: I focused my attention and reviewed everything that had occurred so far.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（さっきまでの、やっぱり焦りすぎてたのかもなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I was probably in too much of a rush earlier..)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I was probably in too much of a rush earlier..)

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんに借りたミステリーの内容を思い出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I recalled one of the mystery novels I'd borrowed from Nishizono-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I recalled one of the mystery novels I'd borrowed from Nishizono-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 安楽椅子に座って、他人から聞いた話のみで推理をする探偵。
MESSAGE.EN: It was about a detective who solved cases by simply listening to witness statements; all while sitting in his armchair.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was about a detective who solved cases by simply listening to witness statements; all while sitting in his armchair.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕のやろうとしてたことは、まさにそれだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was exactly what I needed to do.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was exactly what I needed to do.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんからの情報だけで、原因を探そうとしていたわけだから。
MESSAGE.EN: I was trying figure out a cause based solely off of what Sasasegawa-san could tell me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was trying figure out a cause based solely off of what Sasasegawa-san could tell me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…事件を目の前にしただけで真相に至れるような、名探偵にはなれそうもないよなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...But I don't think I'm smart enough to pass for a detective who can uncover the truth behind cases like him.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...But I don't think I'm smart enough to pass for a detective who can uncover the truth behind cases like him.)

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんが猫になったという事件と、それが起こった原因。
MESSAGE.EN: The case of Sasasegawa-san turning into a cat, and what caused it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The case of Sasasegawa-san turning into a cat, and what caused it.

MESSAGE.JP: 原因の前には過程が存在するし、事件の周りにはそれが影響し、様々な波紋が広がる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even before something happened, there were events that took place which influenced everything surrounding the case, causing various repercussions.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even before something happened, there were events that took place which influenced everything surrounding the case, causing various repercussions.

MESSAGE.JP: 事件、原因、過程、波紋。
MESSAGE.EN: Influences, happenings, events, and repercussions...
MESSAGE.Translation: Influences, happenings, events, and repercussions...

MESSAGE.JP: ミステリー小説の探偵たちは、そんな要素の中から推理を組み立てていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Those were the elements mystery novel detectives based their deductions upon.
MESSAGE.Translation: Those were the elements mystery novel detectives based their deductions upon.

MESSAGE.JP: アプローチの方法は千差万別だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: The approach varied.
MESSAGE.Translation: The approach varied.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（捜査の基本は、足か）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(However, the most basic strategy would be to walk around and look for clues.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(However, the most basic strategy would be to walk around and look for clues.)

MESSAGE.JP: 要素は多い方が、組み立てやすい。
MESSAGE.EN: the more clues I gathered, the easier it would be to put it all together.
MESSAGE.Translation: the more clues I gathered, the easier it would be to put it all together.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あぁ、でもなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Um, but wait...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Um, but wait...)

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、動き回って情報を集める役っていうのは、探偵とは別の狂言回しが多い気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It kind of felt like those who went around collecting clues were merely there to support the detective.
MESSAGE.Translation: It kind of felt like those who went around collecting clues were merely there to support the detective.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（名探偵役がいればなぁ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(If only there was someone who could play the role of a detective around here...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(If only there was someone who could play the role of a detective around here...)

MESSAGE.JP: 猫になるなんて漫画みたいな事件なんだから、こっちだって漫画みたいなヒーローがいてもいい気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: This case, a human turning into a cat, was so much like a comic book that I wouldn't be surprised if a comic book hero showed up to deal with it.
MESSAGE.Translation: This case, a human turning into a cat, was so much like a comic book that I wouldn't be surprised if a comic book hero showed up to deal with it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（恭介は就活でいないんだっけ…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Unfortunately, Kyousuke was elsewhere for job interviews...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Unfortunately, Kyousuke was elsewhere for job interviews...)

MESSAGE.JP: だったら、探偵は僕がやるしかない。
MESSAGE.EN: Therefore it seemed like I would have to take on the role of the detective.
MESSAGE.Translation: Therefore it seemed like I would have to take on the role of the detective.

MESSAGE.JP: …そもそも、笹瀬川さんと話ができるのは、今のところ僕だけだし。
MESSAGE.EN: ...To start with, I was the only one who could communicate with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...To start with, I was the only one who could communicate with her.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@『なんだか、頼れそうなのがあなただけというのも不安ですわ…』
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❛You know, knowing that you are the only one I can rely on right now worries me...❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❛You know, knowing that you are the only one I can rely on right now worries me...❜

MESSAGE.JP: …頼りないかもしれないけど、頼られてるんだったら、それには応えてあげたい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I might not be very reliable, but as she was relying on me, I wanted to do everything I could for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I might not be very reliable, but as she was relying on me, I wanted to do everything I could for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんだって、きっとものすごく不安だろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was sure she was full of anxiety.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was sure she was full of anxiety.

MESSAGE.JP: 出来る限りの事をしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I was determined to do whatever I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was determined to do whatever I could.

MESSAGE.JP: 頼られてるってことは、そうしなきゃいけないってことだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Because that's what you should do when someone asks you for help.
MESSAGE.Translation: Because that's what you should do when someone asks you for help.

MESSAGE.JP: …また、白い。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That whiteness returned again.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That whiteness returned again.

MESSAGE.JP: 寒かった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was freezing cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was freezing cold.

MESSAGE.JP: 凍えそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Almost cold enough to kill you.
MESSAGE.Translation: Almost cold enough to kill you.

MESSAGE.JP: そこで、誰かは思っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet there was someone there thinking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet there was someone there thinking.

MESSAGE.JP: 話したかったこと、いっぱいあった。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛they❜ had so many things ❛they❜ wanted to talk about.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛they❜ had so many things ❛they❜ wanted to talk about.

MESSAGE.JP: 伝えたかったこと、たくさんあった。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛they❜ had so many things ❛they❜ wanted to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛they❜ had so many things ❛they❜ wanted to say.

MESSAGE.JP: でも。
MESSAGE.EN: However.
MESSAGE.Translation: However.

MESSAGE.JP: それができなくて。
MESSAGE.EN: They weren't able to do it.
MESSAGE.Translation: They weren't able to do it.

MESSAGE.JP: 出来ないことが当たり前なんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite knowing that it was futile,
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite knowing that it was futile,

MESSAGE.JP: もしかしたら、なんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛they❜ still kept hoping...
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛they❜ still kept hoping...

MESSAGE.JP: ああ。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、今は、寒い。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet, now there was only the cold.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet, now there was only the cold.

MESSAGE.JP: いなくなった彼らは、どうしてるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: They wondered what those who had left were doing now.
MESSAGE.Translation: They wondered what those who had left were doing now.

MESSAGE.JP: 寄り添っていたら、もっと温かかったのかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Had ❛they❜ still been snuggled up with each other, would it have been warmer...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Had ❛they❜ still been snuggled up with each other, would it have been warmer...?

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、いなくなった彼らはもう二度と会うことはなく。
MESSAGE.EN: However, ❛they❜ had vanished, never to met each other again.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, ❛they❜ had vanished, never to met each other again.

MESSAGE.JP: 春が、来た。
MESSAGE.EN: And then spring arrived.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then spring arrived.

MESSAGE.JP: 翌朝。
MESSAGE.EN: Next morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: Next morning.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふあぁあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Phaaaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Phaaaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 起き上がり、視点に違和感。
MESSAGE.EN: Something felt out of place as I sat up in bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something felt out of place as I sat up in bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、そういえば真人のベッドで寝たんだっけ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, right, I slept in Masato's bed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, right, I slept in Masato's bed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そのまま、下のベッドを覗いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I peeked at the bunk below me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I peeked at the bunk below me.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんはまだ寝てるみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was still asleep.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was still asleep.

MESSAGE.JP: こうやってみると、笹瀬川さんってすごいきれいな人だったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Actually, Sasasegawa-san could have been described as exceptionally beautiful.
MESSAGE.Translation: Actually, Sasasegawa-san could have been described as exceptionally beautiful.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっとドキッとする。
MESSAGE.EN: So much so that my heart almost skipped a beat.
MESSAGE.Translation: So much so that my heart almost skipped a beat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（あんまり、寝顔なんて見てたら失礼だな…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(I think it's rude to watch someone sleeping like this...)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(I think it's rude to watch someone sleeping like this...)

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、朝か…ふわぁあぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, it's morning... Fuwaaa...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, it's morning... Fuwaaa...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 大あくびを掻きながら、床で寝ていた真人が目覚める。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato awoke from his slumber with a big yawn and scratched his head.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato awoke from his slumber with a big yawn and scratched his head.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありゃ？　何でオレ床で寝てんだ？　まあいいか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Why was I sleeping on the floor? Not that I mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Why was I sleeping on the floor? Not that I mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「理樹、朝だぜ。おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Riki, it's morning. Hey.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Riki, it's morning. Hey.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕のベッドに向かって声を掛ける。
MESSAGE.EN: He said looking at my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: He said looking at my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、やば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, this is bad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, this is bad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼん。
MESSAGE.EN: *Pop*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんの姿が消える。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san vanished.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san vanished.

MESSAGE.JP: …猫に戻ったに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She must have turned back into a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She must have turned back into a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありゃ…お、おい、理樹じゃねえ、猫だ!?　理樹のベッドに猫だと!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What... H-Hey, that's not Riki! That's a cat! Why's there a cat in his bed!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What... H-Hey, that's not Riki! That's a cat! Why's there a cat in his bed!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: がば、と黒猫の姿の笹瀬川さんを抱え上げる。
MESSAGE.EN: He lifted the black cat up from my bed.
MESSAGE.Translation: He lifted the black cat up from my bed.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まさか、おまえ…理樹なのかよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Maybe this is... Riki...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Maybe this is... Riki...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 違う。昨日の話はすっかり忘れているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Nope. He seemed to have completely forgotten what I'd told him the previous night.
MESSAGE.Translation: Nope. He seemed to have completely forgotten what I'd told him the previous night.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こんな姿になっちまって…オレはこれからどうすりゃいいんだよぉ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Now that you've turned into this... what am I supposed to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Now that you've turned into this... what am I supposed to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …抱え上げた笹瀬川さんをがくがくと揺する。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He shook Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He shook Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、僕はこっちだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I'm up here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I'm up here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なにい!?　理樹のベッドにこの猫で、オレのベッドに理樹がいて!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What the!? This cat's been in Riki's bed, and he's been in mine!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What the!? This cat's been in Riki's bed, and he's been in mine!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、笹瀬川さん、起きてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was now wide awake...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was now wide awake...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…ぎ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I will...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I will...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'll?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'll?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「にゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Meow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Meow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ぎったんぎったんにしてくれますわぁーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I will beat you to a pulp right here and now!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I will beat you to a pulp right here and now!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぎにゃあああぁぁああぁーーーっ!!!」
MESSAGE.EN: Ginyaaaaaaaaaaa!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Ginyaaaaaaaaaaa!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふん…自業自得ですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hmph... Serves you right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hmph... Serves you right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは猫でも強かった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was quite strong, even as a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was quite strong, even as a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、でもさ…真人もわざとじゃないんだし、もうちょっと優しくしてあげてよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, you know... He didn't do that on purpose, so can't you be a little kinder to him...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, you know... He didn't do that on purpose, so can't you be a little kinder to him...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「や、やさしく!?　このわたくしに、あんな辱めを与えた男に!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝K-Kind to him!? To this man who humiliated me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝K-Kind to him!? To this man who humiliated me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやー、真人も悪気があったわけじゃないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm pretty sure he didn't do that out of spite...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm pretty sure he didn't do that out of spite...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「悪いとも思ってないことのほうが問題ですわよ。デリカシーも無いような男は嫌いですのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It would have been better had it been out of spite. I despise men who have no delicacy!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It would have been better had it been out of spite. I despise men who have no delicacy!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫に対してデリカシーを持つというのも難しいと思うけど、黙っておくことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: The thought of how difficult it was to accommodate cats crossed my mind, but I refrained from saying it out loud.
MESSAGE.Translation: The thought of how difficult it was to accommodate cats crossed my mind, but I refrained from saying it out loud.

MESSAGE.JP: 猫の姿であっても、笹瀬川さんは笹瀬川さんなんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: Even as a cat, Sasasegawa-san was still Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even as a cat, Sasasegawa-san was still Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ああぁ…それにしても、また朝からこの姿ですのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ugh... So I am back to being a cat first thing in the morning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ugh... So I am back to being a cat first thing in the morning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これからどうしよう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What will you do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What will you do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「どうするも何も…これじゃ学校にも行けませんわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝What can I do... I cannot go to school like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝What can I do... I cannot go to school like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕はとりあえず、学校で協力してくれそうな人を探してみるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In that case, I'm gonna go check around school to see if there's anyone who might be able to help us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In that case, I'm gonna go check around school to see if there's anyone who might be able to help us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「笹瀬川さんの言葉が解る人が他にもいたら、その人はきっと助けになってくれると思うんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If I find someone who can understand you, I'm sure they'll give us a hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If I find someone who can understand you, I'm sure they'll give us a hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そう…じゃ、お願いしますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Alright... I will count on you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Alright... I will count on you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もし外に出るときは気をつけてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please be careful if you have to go outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please be careful if you have to go outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ええ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I will...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I will...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、真人、ほら起きて。学食行くよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, Masato. Get up. We're going to the cafeteria.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, Masato. Get up. We're going to the cafeteria.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ね、ねこがぁー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝T-The cat...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝T-The cat...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか、うなされてる…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He was groaning incoherently...
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He was groaning incoherently...

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず真人も起きて、いつもの朝食。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato eventually picked himself up, and we went to the cafeteria for breakfast.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato eventually picked himself up, and we went to the cafeteria for breakfast.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、恭介は就活でまだ帰ってきていないらしく、４人しかいない。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke hadn't returned from his job hunting yet, so it was only the four of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke hadn't returned from his job hunting yet, so it was only the four of us.

MESSAGE.JP: …泊りがけで就活って、今度はどこの秘境で旅をしているんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: Staying overnight to job hunt... Just where on Earth was he wandering around this time...
MESSAGE.Translation: Staying overnight to job hunt... Just where on Earth was he wandering around this time...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ああ、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah, morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah, morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おはよー…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Morning...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Morning...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうした、真人。元気がないじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What's wrong with you, Masato? You don't look so good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What's wrong with you, Masato? You don't look so good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ヘンな夢見ちまったんだよ…オレが猫にボコボコにされるんだぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I had this weird dream... where a kitty cat beat me up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I had this weird dream... where a kitty cat beat me up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「この屈強な肉体を持つこのオレが、猫ごときにボコボコだぜ？　こええったら…どんな猫だよ、みたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How could a kitty cat do that to somebody with solid muscles like mine? It was so horrifying... I was like, 'What kind of kitty is this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How could a kitty cat do that to somebody with solid muscles like mine? It was so horrifying... I was like, 'What kind of kitty is this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「いつものことじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That happens all the time, doesn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That happens all the time, doesn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「割といつものことだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yes, all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yes, all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こないだも猫１０匹にボコボコにされてたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were taken down by ten cats the other day. Remember?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were taken down by ten cats the other day. Remember?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それもごく普通のかわいい猫にだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Moreover, they were all ordinary and cute.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Moreover, they were all ordinary and cute.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「う、うおおおぉぉおぉおーーっ!?　猫こええーーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝U-Uoooooooooo!? Kitties are super scary!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝U-Uoooooooooo!? Kitties are super scary!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ようやく気づいたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you just now realized that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you just now realized that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ばかだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Since he's an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Since he's an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ？　おまえ、ばかっつったか？　どの面さげて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Did you just call me an idiot? Who the hell do you think you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Did you just call me an idiot? Who the hell do you think you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `猫@「にゃー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Cat@❝Meow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Cat@❝Meow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ひいっ!?　こええぇぇーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hiiii!? I'm scared!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hiiii!? I'm scared!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ…ちょっと悪いことしちゃったかなぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh-oh... I think I might've done something bad to him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh-oh... I think I might've done something bad to him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: トラウマの原因は笹瀬川さんだからなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was clearly the cause of his newly-acquired phobia...
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was clearly the cause of his newly-acquired phobia...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「猫が怖いなんておかしいだろ。こんなにかわいいのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How could you find them scary?❞ They're so adorable.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How could you find them scary?❞ They're so adorable.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「よしよし、ゼリー食べるか？　今日はなんとマンゴーだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There, there, want some jelly? Look, we've got mango flavor today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There, there, want some jelly? Look, we've got mango flavor today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「マンゴーもこええぇぇえぇーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Mango's scary toooooo!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Mango's scary toooooo!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え…なんで…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... How come...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... How come...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ちくしょう…なんだってオレがこんなに怖がらなくちゃいけねえんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit... Why the hell do I have to be scared like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit... Why the hell do I have to be scared like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「真人…それではあまりに情けないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Masato... You look utterly pathetic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Masato... You look utterly pathetic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「くそぅ…今のおまえに真顔でそんなこと言われるってな、かなりの屈辱だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Dammit... It's humiliating to hear you say that with a straight face...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Dammit... It's humiliating to hear you say that with a straight face...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Heh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Heh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾が鈴の猫を抱きかかえると、顎の下に指を当てる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo picked up one of Rin's cats and started stroking its chin with his fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo picked up one of Rin's cats and started stroking its chin with his fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほーらよしよしよし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Good kitty, good kitty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Good kitty, good kitty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおっ、ここぞとばかりに格の違いを見せ付けやがってぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wah, now he's showing off his superiority...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wah, now he's showing off his superiority...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はっはっは、俺のライバルを名乗るなら、猫くらいは克服してくることだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hahaha. If you want to call yourself my rival, you'll need to at least overcome your fear of cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hahaha. If you want to call yourself my rival, you'll need to at least overcome your fear of cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: このごつい男ふたりは何を張り合っているのだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: What are these tough guys competing at...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What are these tough guys competing at...?

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「だったら謙吾よお、ライバルのオレにアドバイスか何かねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Then, Kengo, d'you have any advice for me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Then, Kengo, d'you have any advice for me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ふーむ、そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hmm. Let's see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hmm. Let's see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「滝行ならぬ…猫行というのはどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Training in a waterfall... How about training in a kittyfall?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Training in a waterfall... How about training in a kittyfall?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「猫行？　なんだそりゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Training in a kittyfall? What the heck is that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Training in a kittyfall? What the heck is that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「上から次々に降ってくる猫を背に受け続ける、という荒行だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It's a merciless training where you overcome your fears by letting cat after cat fall on your back from above.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It's a merciless training where you overcome your fears by letting cat after cat fall on your back from above.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにい…それは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whaat... That would be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whaat... That would be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が想像しているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to be imagining how that would work.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to be imagining how that would work.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふかーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fukaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fukaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 考えている間に隙を与えてしまったらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking too hard made her drop her guard.
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking too hard made her drop her guard.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しかし、そんなことをしたら、くちゃくちゃになるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But, if we did that, it would be duper duper...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But, if we did that, it would be duper duper...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だが猫に埋もれるとは…まさにくちゃくちゃかわいい荒行じゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then again, being buried under cats... That'd be duper duper cute training, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then again, being buried under cats... That'd be duper duper cute training, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おいおい、このオレがんなかわいいファンシーな荒行できるかよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Don't be silly. How can a man among men such as myself do such cute, fancy training?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Don't be silly. How can a man among men such as myself do such cute, fancy training?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ、あいつに頼めばいいんじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then why don't we ask the guy over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then why don't we ask the guy over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が中庭を指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed her finger toward the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed her finger toward the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬお～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuoo～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuoo～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「確かに急激にへヴィ級な荒行になったが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're right, this suddenly raises the bar...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're right, this suddenly raises the bar...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬお～
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuoo～
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuoo～

MESSAGE.JP: どすん
MESSAGE.EN: *Shake*
MESSAGE.Translation: *Shake*

MESSAGE.JP: どすんっ
MESSAGE.EN: *shake*
MESSAGE.Translation: *shake*

MESSAGE.JP: どすんっ
MESSAGE.EN: *shake*
MESSAGE.Translation: *shake*

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うぎゃああぁぁあぁぁーっ!!
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ugyaaaaaa!!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ugyaaaaaa!!

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それはさすがの筋肉でも死ぬんじゃねえか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even with muscles like mine, I'm pretty sure that'd kill me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even with muscles like mine, I'm pretty sure that'd kill me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まず大量のドルジ級な猫を用意するっていう、高すぎるハードルを越えないといけないしねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝First off, I'd be impressed if we could find a bunch of cats as big as Dorj.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝First off, I'd be impressed if we could find a bunch of cats as big as Dorj.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬきゅ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nukyuu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nukyuu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆったりと寄ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: He slowly drew closer to us.
MESSAGE.Translation: He slowly drew closer to us.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ん、なんだ。聞いてたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm, what? Did you hear us?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm, what? Did you hear us?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬおっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうやら協力してくれるようだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It seems he's willing to help you train.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It seems he's willing to help you train.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや…せっかくの厚意だが遠慮しておくぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well... I appreciate your kind offer, but I'm okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well... I appreciate your kind offer, but I'm okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `ドルジ@「ぬぉ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Dorj@❝Nuo～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Dorj@❝Nuo～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ドルジは一瞬切なげな表情をすると、ごろんごろんと転がっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He seemed dejected for a moment, but then rolled away.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seemed dejected for a moment, but then rolled away.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「あいつは本当に猫なのか…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Is that even a cat...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Is that even a cat...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: その答えは多分、誰も知らない。
MESSAGE.EN: It's possible that no one knew for sure...
MESSAGE.Translation: It's possible that no one knew for sure...

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に入る。
MESSAGE.EN: We entered our classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: We entered our classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「お、来ましたヨ。おっはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh, here they come. Mornin'.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh, here they come. Mornin'.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo mo-ningu-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みんな、おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Morning, everyone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Morning, everyone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おはよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Morning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Morning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あー、みんなおはよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ah, morning, everybody.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ah, morning, everybody.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おはよう、こまりちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Morning, Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Morning, Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、りんちゃんおはよー。今日もいいお天気だねぇー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, morning, Rin-chan. It's nice out again, isn't it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, morning, Rin-chan. It's nice out again, isn't it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うん、猫のお昼寝日和だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yep, it's a perfect day for cats to nap.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yep, it's a perfect day for cats to nap.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 早速鈴は小毬さんと世間話を始める。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san and Rin began chatting amongst themselves shortly after their morning greetings.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san and Rin began chatting amongst themselves shortly after their morning greetings.

MESSAGE.JP: 昔の鈴からは考えられないくらいだけど、今じゃこれが毎朝の習慣だった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the past, Rin would have never done something like that, but now that was the usual morning routine.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the past, Rin would have never done something like that, but now that was the usual morning routine.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん、ちょっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san, can I have a quick word with you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san, can I have a quick word with you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? About what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? About what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …その習慣を邪魔するみたいだけど、今日は仕方ない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I didn't really want to butt into their conversation, but I had no choice today.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I didn't really want to butt into their conversation, but I had no choice today.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昨日の笹瀬川さんのことなんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝About Sasasegawa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝About Sasasegawa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ちゃんと先生にも連絡しておいたよ。病気で動けないーって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ahh. I told her homeroom teacher that she's too sick to move.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ahh. I told her homeroom teacher that she's too sick to move.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you did?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you did?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昨日の話じゃ何にも伝わってなかったように思えたけど、小毬さんも何かは解ってくれてたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though it seemed like she hadn't comprehended anything I said the previous night, she at least understood enough to do that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though it seemed like she hadn't comprehended anything I said the previous night, she at least understood enough to do that...

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「でも、動けないんじゃご飯はどうするのかなぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝But how will she eat if she can't move?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝But how will she eat if she can't move?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 忘れてた。
MESSAGE.EN: I hadn't thought of that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hadn't thought of that.

MESSAGE.JP: しまった、真相究明だとか、犯人探索だとか、事件のことばっかり考えてて、気づかなかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Sheesh, I had been far too engrossed in discovering the truth, searching for the culprit, or simply thinking about what happened...
MESSAGE.Translation: Sheesh, I had been far too engrossed in discovering the truth, searching for the culprit, or simply thinking about what happened...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、何の話だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey, what are you guys talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey, what are you guys talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I know!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I know!❞

MESSAGE.JP: まずは鈴に協力を要請してみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to ask Rin for help.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to ask Rin for help.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、ちょっと頼みがあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, I need you to help me with something.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, I need you to help me with something.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's that...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's that...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昼休みなんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝During lunch break...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝During lunch break...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと猫の話があるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I wanna talk with you about cats.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I wanna talk with you about cats.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「了解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「モンペチを用意して欲しいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I need you to get some Mon Petit for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I need you to get some Mon Petit for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「了解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「キレイな猫トイレを用意して欲しいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'd like you to fix up a litter box for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'd like you to fix up a litter box for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「了解」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Alright.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Alright.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休みになった。
MESSAGE.EN: Lunch break came.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lunch break came.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局、協力してくれそうな人を探してみても、知り合い以外にはいそうもなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I was unable to find anybody other than people I knew to help us.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was unable to find anybody other than people I knew to help us.

MESSAGE.JP: 先に購買でパンを用意してから、鈴に合流することにした。
MESSAGE.EN: After buying some bread at the school store, I met up with Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: After buying some bread at the school store, I met up with Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: …おなか空かせてそうだし、急がないといけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought that I should hurry since Sasasegawa-san had to be really hungry.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought that I should hurry since Sasasegawa-san had to be really hungry.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、鈴ちょっとお願いするよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, I'm counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, I'm counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんなんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's this all about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's this all about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まー、いーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: きっと今の鈴の顔は『My god！　ライクでカッコいいんじゃないか？』というものに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I was pretty sure she was trying to say ❛my god!❜ as in, ❛isn't this cool, eh?❜.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was pretty sure she was trying to say ❛my god!❜ as in, ❛isn't this cool, eh?❜.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、行こうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, let's get going.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, let's get going.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おー、まーいーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, my go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, my go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 正解だったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like I was right.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like I was right.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、寮に戻るのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh? We're heading back to the dorm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh? We're heading back to the dorm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、じゃあちょっとまってて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, could you wait here a moment?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, could you wait here a moment?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おー、まーいーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, my go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, my go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 流行っているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed to really like that phrase.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed to really like that phrase.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず、中を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I poked my head inside my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I poked my head inside my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 隅でひざを抱えていた…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting in a corner, hugging her knees...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting in a corner, hugging her knees...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah!❞

MESSAGE.JP: こっちに気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: She noticed me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She noticed me.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あなたねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝A-Ah, it's you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝A-Ah, it's you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「何だ、誰かいるのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What? Is someone in there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What? Is someone in there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wha...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wha...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼむっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Pop*.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Pop*.

MESSAGE.JP: …猫化した。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She turned into a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She turned into a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふ、ふにゃぁ～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝F-Funya～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝F-Funya～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、あの猫じゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Oh, it's just that cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Oh, it's just that cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こうしてみれば、なかなかかわいいやつだな。よしよし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Looking closely, it's quite adorable. There, there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Looking closely, it's quite adorable. There, there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なるほど、それでこれが必要だったんだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Now I see why you needed this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Now I see why you needed this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「よしよし。ほら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝There, there. Here you go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝There, there. Here you go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 缶を開けて、笹瀬川さんの前に差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened a can and put it down in front of Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened a can and put it down in front of Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴし、という音がして、猫の頭に怒りマークが浮かんだ…ような気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: An angry vein popped out of her forehead... or so it felt.
MESSAGE.Translation: An angry vein popped out of her forehead... or so it felt.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そうか、こいつ用に必要だったんだな。部屋で飼うのは本当はいけないんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I see. This is for this kitty, huh? You aren't supposed to keep a pet in your dorm room, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I see. This is for this kitty, huh? You aren't supposed to keep a pet in your dorm room, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「よーし、あたしが用意してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Alright, I'll set it up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Alright, I'll set it up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんの目の前にトイレを置き、砂を入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She placed the box in front of Sasasegawa-san and put some sand in it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She placed the box in front of Sasasegawa-san and put some sand in it.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どーだ、キレイだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Look, isn't it nice?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Look, isn't it nice?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぴし、という音がして、猫の頭に怒りマークが浮かんだ…ような気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: An angry vein popped out of her forehead... or so it felt.
MESSAGE.Translation: An angry vein popped out of her forehead... or so it felt.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「な、棗鈴…あなた、どこまで人を馬鹿にしてますのっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ri-Rin Natsume... How far will you go to mock me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ri-Rin Natsume... How far will you go to mock me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーん、しかしあたしはこいつには嫌われてるからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hmm, this one really seems to hate me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hmm, this one really seems to hate me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「く、屈辱ですわ…わが最大のライバルにこんな姿を見られるなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝L-Letting my biggest rival see me like this... H-How humiliating...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝L-Letting my biggest rival see me like this... H-How humiliating...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、今の言葉わからない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin, do you understand what she just said?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin, do you understand what she just said?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「にゅあんすでならわかるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I do, through nuance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I do, through nuance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗鈴、わたくしの言葉がわかりますの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume, do you understand me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume, do you understand me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴のところに歩いていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san walked up to Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san walked up to Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ん？　おー、まーいーが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm? Oh my god.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm? Oh my god.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 完全に「OH! My god！」になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She just said ❛oh my god❜ properly!
MESSAGE.Translation: She just said ❛oh my god❜ properly!

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「顎を撫でて欲しいらしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Looks like she wants me to rub her chin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Looks like she wants me to rub her chin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 全然違う。
MESSAGE.EN: A complete miss.
MESSAGE.Translation: A complete miss.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「寄ってくるなんて珍しいな。よしよし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You don't normally get this close to me. There, there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You don't normally get this close to me. There, there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「きーっ!!　触らないでくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Kiiiii!! Will you please not touch me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Kiiiii!! Will you please not touch me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うわっ、こいつ突然怒ったぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uwah! And now she's mad!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uwah! And now she's mad!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず仲裁にはいろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to step in...
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to step in...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあまあ、落ち着いて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Easy, easy, calm down...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Easy, easy, calm down...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふかーっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hukaaa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hukaaa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やっぱり嫌われてるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝She really does hate me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝She really does hate me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「もーいーですわ、さっさと追い返してくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I have had it! Get her out of here, would you!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I have had it! Get her out of here, would you!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「って言われても…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Even if you say that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Even if you say that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しょうがないな。あたしは戻るぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Guess there's nothing I can do here. I'm heading back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Guess there's nothing I can do here. I'm heading back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、そう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ちっちっち、と指を振る。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin shook her finger, saying ❛tch, tch, tch.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin shook her finger, saying ❛tch, tch, tch.❜

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「嫌われてる猫の近くにいると、もっと嫌われるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The longer you're with a cat that hates you, the deeper that hatred grows.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The longer you're with a cat that hates you, the deeper that hatred grows.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こーいうのは、ちょっとずつ慣らしていくしかないんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You have to take your time to tame cats like her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You have to take your time to tame cats like her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へえ…そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I didn't know that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I didn't know that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そういうわけだからあたしは戻る」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's why I'm heading back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's why I'm heading back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。悪いね、付き合わせちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, okay. Thanks for your help.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, okay. Thanks for your help.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹はしょーがないやつだからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You sure are hopeless.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You sure are hopeless.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 出て行く。
MESSAGE.EN: She left the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: She left the room.

MESSAGE.JP: …最後の返答は『まーいーが』がくるかと思ったけど、あっという間に廃れたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I half expected her to add another 'my go' but she didn't; it seemed she had already grown tired of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I half expected her to add another 'my go' but she didn't; it seemed she had already grown tired of it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「とりあえず、鈴は言葉わからないみたいだったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, it looks like Rin didn't understand what you were saying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, it looks like Rin didn't understand what you were saying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふんっ…棗鈴の手など借りたくもないですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hmph! ...I need no help from Rin Natsume.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hmph! ...I need no help from Rin Natsume.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それより、一体何ですのこれは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝More importantly, what in the world is this thing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝More importantly, what in the world is this thing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗鈴め…こんなペットフードを持ってくるなんて、馬鹿にしているにも程がありますわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Curse you, Rin Natsume... How dare you bring me pet food like this! I have never felt so humiliated!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Curse you, Rin Natsume... How dare you bring me pet food like this! I have never felt so humiliated!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめん…今猫だし、そのほうがいいかと思って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sorry... I thought it would be better since you're a cat right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sorry... I thought it would be better since you're a cat right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…あなたの発案ですの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...This was your idea?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...This was your idea?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …怖い。猫なのに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She looked truly frightening despite being a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She looked truly frightening despite being a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん…今度はもっと美味しそうなモンペチを用意するよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I apologize... I promise I'll get you more delicious Mon Petit next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I apologize... I promise I'll get you more delicious Mon Petit next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「モンペチから離れてくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would you please forget about Mon Petit!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would you please forget about Mon Petit!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だって、猫が普通のご飯食べたらおなか壊すかもしれないし…僕なりに考えた結果なんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But you know, if a cat eats human food, it might get a stomach ache. That's why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But you know, if a cat eats human food, it might get a stomach ache. That's why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「元に戻ってから食べますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I'll eat when I return to my normal self.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I'll eat when I return to my normal self.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おなか空かない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aren't you hungry?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aren't you hungry?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それくらい我慢できますわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I can handle it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I can handle it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まったく…あなたを頼りにしていかなきゃいけないって、ものすごく不安なことですのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For the love of god... It's truly worrisome to think that you're the only one I can rely on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For the love of god... It's truly worrisome to think that you're the only one I can rely on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 評価が下がった…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her impression of me dropped...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her impression of me dropped...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「こんなものをわざわざ用意してくるなんて…コケにしようとしてたとしか思えませんわ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝How dare she buy me such a thing... I can only take this as intentional mockery!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝How dare she buy me such a thing... I can only take this as intentional mockery!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやー、あれ僕なんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, this was my idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, this was my idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hah?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hah?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 睨まれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She was glaring needles at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was glaring needles at me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめん…新聞紙じゃやっぱり失礼だったかと思って、ちゃんとしたのを…ぶっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, sorry... I thought newspaper wouldn't be appropriate, so I got you a proper litter bo... Bwaa!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, sorry... I thought newspaper wouldn't be appropriate, so I got you a proper litter bo... Bwaa!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 皿を顔面にぶつけられた。
MESSAGE.EN: The plate hit me in the face.
MESSAGE.Translation: The plate hit me in the face.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「い、痛いなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝T-That hurt...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝T-That hurt...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「温厚なわたくしでも、終いにはキレますわよっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am a most good-natured person, but if you offend me any further, I WILL lose my temper!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am a most good-natured person, but if you offend me any further, I WILL lose my temper!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ご、ごめんってば…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、じゃあ今度はちゃんと隠れるようなのを…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, then if I put some kind of curtain around the box...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, then if I put some kind of curtain around the box...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わーっ、ごめんごめんごめんっ、僕が考え無しだったよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Waaa! I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I'm sorry for being thoughtless!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Waaa! I'm sorry, I'm sorry! I'm sorry for being thoughtless!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ひっっじょーーーに不安ですわ…今後もあなたとやっていけるのかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝This is gravely concerning... I wonder if I will be able to get along with you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝This is gravely concerning... I wonder if I will be able to get along with you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 評価が激減した…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her impression of me plummeted...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her impression of me plummeted...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「反省したなら、何か食べ物を用意してきてくださらない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Now then, if you have reflected on your actions, would you please bring me something normal to eat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Now then, if you have reflected on your actions, would you please bring me something normal to eat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…そうだね、何もなかったね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, sure... Right, there's no food here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, sure... Right, there's no food here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ほら、早く行ってきてくださいます？　くだらない漫談に付き合ってたせいで、余計におなかが減ってしまいましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Could you hurry? After being put through that imprudent charade, I have found myself to be even more hungry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Could you hurry? After being put through that imprudent charade, I have found myself to be even more hungry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、購買にパン買いに行ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright then, I'll go get some bread at the school store.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright then, I'll go get some bread at the school store.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何か野菜の入ったサンドイッチをお願いしますわ。あと、紅茶も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝May I have a vegetable sandwich and black tea, please?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝May I have a vegetable sandwich and black tea, please?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく考えたら、傍から見た今の僕は、猫に顎で使われてるんだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's when I realized that I was being bossed around by a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's when I realized that I was being bossed around by a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: モンペチを差し出す。
MESSAGE.EN: I held the can of Mon Petit out toward her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I held the can of Mon Petit out toward her.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…何のつもりですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Would you care to explain?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Would you care to explain?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「食べてみたら美味しいかもしれないよって思って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I think you might like it if you try...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I think you might like it if you try...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ブ・チ・き・れ・ますわよぉーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Are you TRYING to make me angry!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Are you TRYING to make me angry!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁっ、ご、ごめんごめんごめんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah, I-I'm sorry! So sorry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah, I-I'm sorry! So sorry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「さっさと購買行ってサンドイッチと紅茶を用意してきなさいっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Will you just go buy a sandwich and black tea for me already!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Will you just go buy a sandwich and black tea for me already!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 猫に追い出された…。
MESSAGE.EN: I got kicked out of my room by a cat...
MESSAGE.Translation: I got kicked out of my room by a cat...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、購買にパン買いに行ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll go get some bread at the school store.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I'll go get some bread at the school store.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何か野菜の入ったサンドイッチをお願いしますわ。あと、紅茶も」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝May I have a vegetable sandwich and black tea please?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝May I have a vegetable sandwich and black tea please?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: よく考えたら、傍から見た今の僕は、猫に顎で使われてるんだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's when I realized that I was being bossed around by a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's when I realized that I was being bossed around by a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、そうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, right.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, right.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おなか空いてるだろうと思って、パン買ってきたんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought you must've been hungry, so I bought you some bread.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought you must've been hungry, so I bought you some bread.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あら…気が利きますわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝O-Oh my... how thoughtful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝O-Oh my... how thoughtful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「アンパンとかやきそばパンとかだけど…なにか嫌いなものってある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've got anpan, yakisoba bread, and... Actually, is there anything you dislike?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've got anpan, yakisoba bread, and... Actually, is there anything you dislike?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「好き嫌いは特にありませんわ。野菜の入ったサンドイッチが食べたいですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am not particularly picky. I would have appreciated it had you brought a vegetable sandwich as well, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am not particularly picky. I would have appreciated it had you brought a vegetable sandwich as well, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありゃ…それ買ってくればよかったね、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh-oh... I should've gotten that too. Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh-oh... I should've gotten that too. Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「べ、別に…なんであなたが謝りますの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-It is not your fault... Rather, why would you apologize?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-It is not your fault... Rather, why would you apologize?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…朝の時点で気付いてればよかったと思ってさ。そしたらサンドイッチがいいって聞けたし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... Had I realized your food situation this morning, I could've asked what you wanted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... Had I realized your food situation this morning, I could've asked what you wanted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そこまで気を遣わなくても大丈夫ですわよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Y-You need not concern yourself that much...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Y-You need not concern yourself that much...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう？　よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh? That's reassuring.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh? That's reassuring.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…これは、元に戻ってから食べたほうが良さそうですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I suppose I should not eat these until I change back into a human.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I suppose I should not eat these until I change back into a human.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー…確かにそうかも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah... you're probably right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah... you're probably right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…ふうん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなた、思ったより頼もしいのかもしれませんわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You might be more reliable than I thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You might be more reliable than I thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　そんなこと無いと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? I wouldn't be so sure of that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? I wouldn't be so sure of that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これからもよろしくお願いしますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I shall be counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I shall be counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…ついでに、紅茶なんかがあると嬉しいんですけれど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I would appreciate it if you could get me black tea as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I would appreciate it if you could get me black tea as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、じゃあ行ってくるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, I'll go get some.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, I'll go get some.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ええ、お願いしますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Thank you in advance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Thank you in advance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 購買で買い物を済ませて戻ると、笹瀬川さんは元に戻っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: When I returned to our room, I found Sasasegawa-san in her human form.
MESSAGE.Translation: When I returned to our room, I found Sasasegawa-san in her human form.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい、買ってきたよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Here, as you requested.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Here, as you requested.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ええ、助かりますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah, thank you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah, thank you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、まだなんかあった？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, did you need anything else?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, did you need anything else?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いえ…わたくしがこんな引きこもりのような生活をしているのかと思うと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝No... Facing the fact that I am living here like a shut-in...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝No... Facing the fact that I am living here like a shut-in...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だんだん情けなくなってきましたわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It really is making me feel pathetic...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It really is making me feel pathetic...❞

MESSAGE.JP: がく、とうなだれる。
MESSAGE.EN: She hung her head in disappointment.
MESSAGE.Translation: She hung her head in disappointment.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ、ほ、ほら、元気出してさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, h-hey, cheer up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, h-hey, cheer up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ううぅ…早くもくじけそうですわぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uuu... I am already about to give in...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uuu... I am already about to give in...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと、ほら、笹瀬川さんはすごいじゃないか!!　ソフト部結構強いのに、一年の頃からレギュラーとってさ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know what, just think about how talented you are!! You've been a regular on the softball team since you were a first-year!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know what, just think about how talented you are!! You've been a regular on the softball team since you were a first-year!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、そうでしたわ…わたくしはソフト部のホープでエース…!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝T-That is true... I am the hope and ace of the softball club...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝T-That is true... I am the hope and ace of the softball club...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「悔しさを噛み締め、辛さに耐え…ここまで積み上げてきた精神力の持ち主でしたわ…っ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I have made it through so many trials and tribulations... and have built up unrivaled willpower...!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I have made it through so many trials and tribulations... and have built up unrivaled willpower...!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Fuh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Fuh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ほほほほ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Hohohoho.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Hohohoho.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「おーっほっほっほ!!　こんなことでくじけそうになるとは、わたくしも焼きが回ったものですわねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oohohoho!! How pathetic of me to almost let such trivial matters lead me astray!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oohohoho!! How pathetic of me to almost let such trivial matters lead me astray!❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、ごくあっさりと立ち直った…。
MESSAGE.EN: An instant recovery...
MESSAGE.Translation: An instant recovery...

MESSAGE.JP: 意外と扱いやすい人なのかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, I realized she might actually be pretty easy to deal with.
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, I realized she might actually be pretty easy to deal with.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そうですわ。こーなったら猫でもなんでも構いませんわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That is right. I no longer care if I am a cat or anything else!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That is right. I no longer care if I am a cat or anything else!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「直枝理樹!!　放課後は少し協力してもらいますわよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Riki Naoe!! You shall give me a hand after school!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Riki Naoe!! You shall give me a hand after school!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、うん。できることがあるなら何でもやるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, sure. I'll do anything I can for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, sure. I'll do anything I can for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 元気になったはいいけど、いつもの笹瀬川さんのノリだとやたら高圧的だなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was glad she had regained her vigor, but her usual attitude was rather imperious...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was glad she had regained her vigor, but her usual attitude was rather imperious...

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後。
MESSAGE.EN: After school.
MESSAGE.Translation: After school.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「来ましたわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝There you are.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝There you are.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 中庭で笹瀬川さんと合流。
MESSAGE.EN: I met up with Sasasegawa-san in the courtyard.
MESSAGE.Translation: I met up with Sasasegawa-san in the courtyard.

MESSAGE.JP: 見た目はもちろん猫だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Needless to say, she was a cat once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Needless to say, she was a cat once again.

MESSAGE.JP: でもなんか、最初に比べると表情が読めるようになってきた気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I felt like I'd grown a little better at reading her expressions.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I felt like I'd grown a little better at reading her expressions.

MESSAGE.JP: 声はそのままだし、笹瀬川さんの姿が脳裏に浮かぶようになってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice hadn't changed, but it was almost like I could see her human form while she was talking.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice hadn't changed, but it was almost like I could see her human form while she was talking.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、で、どうするの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm here. So what should we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm here. So what should we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まずはあなたのような、わたくしの言葉がわかる人を探しますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝To start with, we should find someone who can understand me like you can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝To start with, we should find someone who can understand me like you can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしの考えでは、その人は何かしら手がかりになるはず…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And I suspect that someone will also be some sort of clue.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And I suspect that someone will also be some sort of clue.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ？　それ今日僕が言ってたことだった気が…。昼休みにやろうと思ってたんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hold on a second. Isn't that what I said this morning...? I was going to do that during lunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hold on a second. Isn't that what I said this morning...? I was going to do that during lunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「な、何でもいいですわよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-It matters not!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-It matters not!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それに、一人ずつなんて非効率なやり方、わたくしには向きませんの。やるなら一度に一気に、ですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Besides, I dislike the inefficiency of asking one by one. I prefer asking as many people as possible at once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Besides, I dislike the inefficiency of asking one by one. I prefer asking as many people as possible at once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そういうわけで、行きますわよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Now then, let us commence!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Now then, let us commence!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 歩き出す笹瀬川さんの後ろに、僕もついていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She started walking, and I followed after her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She started walking, and I followed after her.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そこの方っ、聞こえます？　もしもし？　もしもーしっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Excuse me, do you understand what I'm saying? Hello? Hello!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Excuse me, do you understand what I'm saying? Hello? Hello!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 手当たり次第に声を掛ける笹瀬川さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked every person that she ran across.
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked every person that she ran across.

MESSAGE.JP: かなりハイテンションになっているみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She really looked like she was into it.
MESSAGE.Translation: She really looked like she was into it.

MESSAGE.JP: …けど、やっぱりにゃーとしか聞こえていないのか、周りの反応はない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...However, no one showed any signs of comprehension.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...However, no one showed any signs of comprehension.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「きゃー、この猫かわいいー!!　直枝君が飼ってるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Look, this kitty's so adorable!! Is it your pet, Naoe-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Look, this kitty's so adorable!! Is it your pet, Naoe-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: と思ったら、クラスメイトの女子が笹瀬川さんを見てこっちに来た。
MESSAGE.EN: One of my female classmates noticed her and approached.
MESSAGE.Translation: One of my female classmates noticed her and approached.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「うっさいですわっ!!　邪魔しないでくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You are so noisy!! Would you stop interrupting us!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You are so noisy!! Would you stop interrupting us!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ふしゃー、と威嚇する。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Fushhaaa,❜ she hissed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Fushhaaa,❜ she hissed.

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「きゃっ、い、いきなりなにっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Female Student@❝Kyaa! W-Why did it suddenly get mad?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Female Student@❝Kyaa! W-Why did it suddenly get mad?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、ごめん、ちょっと今は気が立っててこんな感じなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Er, sorry. She's just a little nervous right now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Er, sorry. She's just a little nervous right now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「猫扱いするなですわぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Do not treat me like a cat!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Do not treat me like a cat!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁっ、ごめんごめんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah, sorry, sorry!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah, sorry, sorry!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `女生徒@「な、なんか大変そうだね直枝君…」
